entry.content:
æ·±åº¦å­¸ç¿’ç™¼å±•è‡³ä»Šå·²ç¶“æœ‰ç›¸ç•¶å¤šå¥½ç”¨çš„å¥—ä»¶ï¼Œä½¿å¾—é€²å…¥çš„é–€æª»å¤§å¤§çš„é™ä½ï¼Œå› æ­¤å¦‚æœæƒ³è¦å¿«é€Ÿçš„å¯¦ä½œä¸€äº›æ·±åº¦å­¸ç¿’æˆ–æ©Ÿå™¨å­¸ç¿’ï¼Œé€šå¸¸æ˜¯å¹¾è¡Œç¨‹å¼ç¢¼å¯ä»¥è§£æ±ºçš„äº‹ã€‚ä½†æ˜¯ï¼Œå¦‚æœæƒ³è¦å°‡æ·±åº¦å­¸ç¿’æˆ–æ©Ÿå™¨å­¸ç¿’ç•¶ä½œä¸€ä»½å·¥ä½œï¼Œæ·±å…¥äº†è§£å®ƒèƒŒå¾Œçš„åŸç†å’Œæ•¸å­¸æ˜¯å¿…è¦çš„ï¼Œæ‰æœ‰å¯èƒ½å› åœ°åˆ¶å®œçš„éˆæ´»é‹ç”¨ï¼ŒYCæº–å‚™åœ¨é€™ä¸€ç³»åˆ—ç•¶ä¸­å¸¶å¤§å®¶æ·±å…¥å‰–ææ·±åº¦å­¸ç¿’ã€‚

åœ¨ä¸Šä¸€è¬›ç•¶ä¸­ï¼Œæˆ‘é‰…ç´°é¡éºçš„ä»‹ç´¹äº†Normal Distributionã€‚å…¶ä¸­æˆ‘æœ‰ç¨å¾®çš„æåˆ°Entropyçš„æ¦‚å¿µï¼Œä¸¦ä¸”èªªåœ¨æœªä¾†æœƒæœ‰ä¸€è¬›å°ˆé–€ä¾†è«‡æ©Ÿå™¨å­¸ç¿’è£¡é¢æœƒç”¨åˆ°çš„è³‡è¨Šç†è«–ï¼Œè€Œé‚£å€‹æœªä¾†å°±æ˜¯ç¾åœ¨ï¼

åœ¨æ·±åº¦å­¸ç¿’è£¡é¢ï¼Œå°¤å…¶æ˜¯åˆ†é¡å•é¡Œï¼Œå¸¸å¸¸æœƒç”¨åˆ°Cross Entropyï¼Œæ•™å­¸ä¸Šé€šå¸¸æœƒå¾Maximum Likelihoodæ¨å°è€Œä¾†ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯Cross Entropyå…¶å¯¦å…·æœ‰æ›´å»£ç¾©çš„æ¶µç¾©ï¼Œç”šè‡³ä¸é™æ–¼åˆ†é¡å•é¡Œä½¿ç”¨ã€‚

é‚„æœ‰å­¸ç¿’éç¨‹ä¹Ÿç¶“å¸¸æœƒå‡ºç¾KL Divergenceé€™æ¨£æ—¢ç†Ÿæ‚‰åˆé™Œç”Ÿçš„æ±è¥¿ï¼Œç”šè‡³åˆ°äº†GANæœƒç”¨åˆ°æ›´å¤šç¨®é¡çš„Divergenceï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚ï¼šJS Divergenceã€‚

é€™å…¨éƒ¨éƒ½èˆ‡è³‡è¨Šç†è«–æ¯æ¯ç›¸é—œï¼Œé€™ä¸€è¬›è®“æˆ‘å€‘ä¾†ææ¸…æ¥šEntropyã€Cross Entropyã€KL Divergenceå’Œf-Divergenceåˆ°åº•å…·æœ‰ä»€éº¼æ¶µç¾©ã€‚

é€™ä¸€åˆ‡éƒ½è¦å…ˆå¾Entropyé–‹å§‹è¬›èµ·ã€‚

è³‡è¨Šç†µï¼ˆInformation Entropyï¼‰

è³‡è¨Šç†è«–æ˜¯æ‡‰ç”¨æ•¸å­¸çš„ä¸€å€‹åˆ†æ”¯ï¼Œä¸»è¦æ˜¯å°è¨Šè™Ÿä¸­å­˜åœ¨çš„è³‡è¨Šå¤šå¯¡åšé‡åŒ–ã€‚æœ€åˆç ”ç©¶ç›®çš„æ˜¯ç‚ºäº†æ•¸æ“šå‚³è¼¸çš„ç·¨ç¢¼ï¼Œæ¢è¨è¦æ€éº¼ç·¨ç¢¼è³‡æ–™å‚³è¼¸æ‰æœ‰æ•ˆç‡ã€‚

è³‡è¨Šç†è«–èƒŒå¾Œçš„ç›´è¦ºæ˜¯ï¼Œè¶Šæ˜¯ä¸å®¹æ˜“ç™¼ç”Ÿçš„äº‹ä»¶å¸¶çµ¦æˆ‘å€‘çš„è³‡è¨Šé‡è¶Šå¤§ï¼Œè³‡è¨Šé‡çš„å¤§å°å¯ä»¥çœ‹ä½œæ˜¯äº‹ä»¶çµ¦æˆ‘å€‘çš„é©šè¨ç¨‹åº¦ã€‚èˆ‰å€‹ä¾‹å­ï¼Œã€Œä»Šå¤©æ—©ä¸Šå¤ªé™½å‡èµ·ã€é€™æ¨£å¹¾ä¹æ°¸é éƒ½æ˜¯å°çš„äº‹ä»¶ï¼Œèƒ½å¸¶çµ¦æˆ‘å€‘çš„è³‡è¨Šé‡å¯ä»¥èªªæ˜¯é›¶ï¼ˆä½ ä¸ç”¨å‘Šè¨´æˆ‘ï¼Œæˆ‘ä¹ŸçŸ¥é“ï¼‰ï¼›ç›¸åçš„ã€Œä»Šå¤©æ—©ä¸Šæœ‰æ—¥è•ã€çš„äº‹ä»¶å‰‡å«æœ‰ç›¸å°å¤šçš„è³‡è¨Šé‡ã€‚

\(äº‹ä»¶çš„è³‡è¨Šé‡ \propto äº‹ä»¶çš„ä¸ç¢ºå®šç¨‹åº¦\)

æœ‰äº†é€™æ¨£çš„æ´è¦‹ï¼Œæˆ‘å€‘æ€éº¼æŠŠå®ƒåŒ–æˆæ•¸å­¸å‘¢ï¼Ÿæˆ‘å€‘å¯ä»¥å®šç¾©äº‹ä»¶çš„Self-Informationç‚ºï¼š

$$ I(x)=-log_2p(x) \ \ â†ªï¸ã€1ã€‘ $$

å…¶ä¸­\(log_2\)ä»¥2ç‚ºåº•ï¼Œå‰‡ä»£è¡¨æ‰€æ¡ç”¨çš„å–®ä½ç‚º bits (æ¯”ç‰¹)ï¼›\(p(x)\)ä»£è¡¨çš„æ˜¯äº‹ä»¶çš„å‡ºç¾æ©Ÿç‡ï¼Œæ­¤å¼å­ç¬¦åˆä»¥ä¸‹å››å€‹ç‰¹æ€§

  1. ç•¶\(0<p(x)\leq 1\)æ™‚ï¼Œå‰‡\(I(x)>0\)ï¼Œé€™æ„å‘³è‘—è³‡è¨Šé‡å¿…ç‚ºæ­£ï¼Œå¦‚æœé‡åˆ°é›œè¨Šå¹²æ“¾æ‰æœ‰å¯èƒ½æ‰£æ‰ä¸€äº›è³‡è¨Šé‡
  2. ç•¶äº‹ä»¶æ°¸é æ˜¯å°çš„æ™‚ï¼Œå‰‡\(p(x)=1\)ï¼Œç›¸æ‡‰çš„ \(I(x)=0\)ï¼Œä»£è¡¨è³‡è¨Šé‡ç‚ºé›¶
  3. ç•¶\(p(x)\)è¶Šå°ï¼Œå‰‡\(I(x)\)è¶Šå¤§ï¼Œæ„å‘³è‘—äº‹ä»¶å‡ºç¾çš„æ©Ÿç‡è¶Šå°ï¼Œå®ƒæ‰€æ”œå¸¶çš„è³‡è¨Šé‡è¶Šå¤§
  4. è‹¥\(p(x)=p_1(x)\times p_2(x)\)å‰‡ä»£è¡¨å…©å€‹ç¨ç«‹äº‹ä»¶ç™¼ç”Ÿçš„æ©Ÿç‡æ˜¯ç›¸ä¹˜çš„é—œä¿‚ï¼Œæ­¤æ™‚è³‡è¨Šé‡æ‡‰è©²æ˜¯ç›¸åŠ çš„é—œä¿‚ï¼Œé—œä¿‚å¼\(I(x)=I_1(x)+I_2(x)\)æ­£è¡¨ç¤ºé€™æ¨£çš„é—œä¿‚

Self-Informationåªè™•ç†å–®ä¸€çµæœï¼Œæˆ‘å€‘æ›´æƒ³è¦é—œæ³¨æ•´å€‹ç³»çµ±ï¼ŒShannon Entropyå¯ä»¥é‡åŒ–æ•´å€‹æ©Ÿç‡åˆ†å¸ƒä¸­ä¸ç¢ºå®šæ€§çš„ç¨‹åº¦ï¼š

$$ H(x)=E_{x\sim p}[I(x)]=-E_{x\sim p}[log_2p(x)] \ \ â†ªï¸ã€2ã€‘ $$

ä¸Šå¼æ‰€å‚³é”çš„æ„æ€æ˜¯ï¼šShannon Entropyå³æ˜¯è©•ä¼°Self-Informationçš„æœŸæœ›å€¼ã€‚

ç‚ºäº†é€²ä¸€æ­¥çš„äº†è§£Shannon Entropyçš„å…§æ¶µï¼Œæˆ‘å€‘ä¾†èˆ‰å€‹ä¾‹å­ã€‚å‡è¨­ä½ çš„ç³»çµ±æ˜¯é›¢æ•£çš„ï¼Œå¯ä»¥é€²ä¸€æ­¥è¡¨ç¤ºæˆç‚º

$$ H(x)=-E_{x\sim p}[log_2p(x)]=-\sum_i p_ilog_2 p_i \ \ â†ªï¸ã€3ã€‘ $$

å‡è¨­ä½ è¦æè¿°çš„äº‹ä»¶æœ‰ä¸‰å€‹ç¨ç«‹äº‹ä»¶Aã€Bå’ŒCï¼ŒAäº‹ä»¶å‡ºç¾æ©Ÿç‡ç‚º\(1/2\)ï¼ŒBäº‹ä»¶å‡ºç¾æ©Ÿç‡ç‚º\(1/4\)ï¼ŒCäº‹ä»¶å‡ºç¾æ©Ÿç‡ç‚º\(1/4\)ï¼Œä»£å…¥å¼ã€3ã€‘æ±‚ç³»çµ±çš„Shannon Entropyï¼š

$$ H=-\frac{1}{2}log_2(\frac{1}{2})-\frac{1}{4}log_2(\frac{1}{4})-\frac{1}{4}log_2(\frac{1}{4})=0.5+0.5+0.5=1.5 \ \ â†ªï¸ã€4ã€‘ $$

é€™ä»£è¡¨ä»€éº¼æ„ç¾©å‘¢ï¼Ÿé€™ä»£è¡¨ä»Šå¤©å¦‚æœä½ è¨­è¨ˆä¸€å€‹ç³»çµ±å¾—ç•¶çš„è©±ï¼Œä½ åªéœ€è¦ç”¨åˆ°å¹³å‡1.5å€‹bitsä¾†å‚³è¼¸ã€‚æ€éº¼èªªå‘¢ï¼Ÿæˆ‘å€‘é€æ­¥æ‹†è§£å¼ã€4ã€‘å¸¶çµ¦æˆ‘å€‘çš„è§€å¿µï¼š

  • Aäº‹ä»¶çš„\(I=1\)ï¼Œä»£è¡¨ç”¨1å€‹bitå»å‚³è¼¸Aäº‹ä»¶ï¼Œå³\(bits_A=1\)ï¼Œå¯èƒ½ç·¨ç¢¼ç‚º0
  • Bäº‹ä»¶çš„\(I=2\)ï¼Œä»£è¡¨ç”¨2å€‹bitså»å‚³è¼¸Bäº‹ä»¶ï¼Œå³\(bits_B=2\)ï¼Œå¯èƒ½ç·¨ç¢¼ç‚º10
  • Cäº‹ä»¶çš„\(I=2\)ï¼Œä»£è¡¨ç”¨2å€‹bitså»å‚³è¼¸Cäº‹ä»¶ï¼Œå³\(bits_C=2\)ï¼Œå¯èƒ½ç·¨ç¢¼ç‚º11

ä½ æœƒç™¼ç¾ç¶“å¸¸å‡ºç¾çš„äº‹ä»¶Aå°±ç”¨è¼ƒå°‘çš„bitsä¾†å‚³è¼¸ï¼Œè€Œè¼ƒä¸å¸¸ç™¼ç”Ÿçš„äº‹ä»¶Bå°±ç”¨æ¯”è¼ƒå¤šçš„bitsä¾†å‚³è¼¸ï¼Œå¦‚æ­¤ä¸€ä¾†å‚³è¼¸æœƒæ›´æœ‰æ•ˆç‡ã€‚å‡è¨­æœ‰200å€‹äº‹ä»¶è¦å‚³è¼¸ï¼Œä¾ç…§æ©Ÿç‡åˆ†å¸ƒï¼Œå…¶ä¸­æ‡‰è©²æœ‰100ä»¶å±¬æ–¼Aäº‹ä»¶ï¼Œæœ‰50ä»¶å±¬æ–¼Bäº‹ä»¶ï¼Œæœ‰50ä»¶å±¬æ–¼Cäº‹ä»¶ï¼Œä¾ç…§ä¸Šè¿°çš„ç·¨ç¢¼æ–¹å¼ï¼Œæˆ‘å€‘å‚³è¼¸é€™200å€‹äº‹ä»¶æ‰€éœ€è¦çš„é æœŸå¹³å‡bitsæ•¸å°±æ˜¯1.5ã€‚

$$ \frac{n_A\times bits_A+n_B\times bits_B+n_C\times bits_C}{n_A+n_B+n_C}=\frac{100\times 1+50\times 2+50\times 2}{200}=1.5 \ \ â†ªï¸ã€5ã€‘ $$

è€Œç†è«–å‘Šè¨´æˆ‘å€‘é€™ \(1.5\) å…¶å¯¦å°±æ˜¯æœ€å°çš„é æœŸä½å…ƒï¼Œä½ ç„¡æ³•æ‰¾åˆ°æ¯”é€™å€‹æ›´å°çš„ï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯èªªï¼šä½ ç„¡æ³•æ‰¾åˆ°æ¯”é€™å€‹æ›´æœ‰æ•ˆç‡çš„ç·¨ç¢¼ç³»çµ±ã€‚ç†è«–å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

The Noiseless Coding Theorm (Shannon, 1948):

The entropy is a lower bound on the number of bits needed to transmit the state of a random variable.

ä¾†åšå€‹å°çµè«–ï¼Œä»”ç´°å›æƒ³å‰›å‰›çš„éç¨‹ä½ æœƒæ›´èƒ½äº†è§£å…¬å¼éš±è—çš„æ„ç¾©ã€‚å¦‚æœä½ ä»”ç´°çš„å»ç†è§£å‰›å‰›æˆ‘èˆ‰çš„ä¾‹å­ï¼Œä½ æœƒç™¼ç¾ï¼š \(I(x)\)ï¼Œæˆ–è€…Entropyä¸­çš„\(-log\) ï¼Œæ‰€æ‰®æ¼”çš„è§’è‰²æ˜¯ã€Œç·¨ç¢¼ã€ï¼Œæ±ºå®šéœ€è¦ç”¨å¹¾å€‹bitsä¾†å‚³è¼¸äº‹ä»¶ï¼Œè€ŒEntropyçš„æ„ç¾©å°±æ˜¯é€™å¥—ã€Œç·¨ç¢¼ã€é‹ç”¨åˆ°ç³»çµ±çš„bitsæœŸæœ›å€¼ï¼Œä¸¦ä¸”Shannonçš„ç†è«–å‘Šè¨´æˆ‘å€‘\(-log\ p(x)\)å·²ç¶“æ˜¯æœ€æœ‰æ•ˆç‡çš„ã€Œç·¨ç¢¼ã€ï¼Œå®ƒå¯ä»¥å¾—åˆ°æœ€å°çš„bitsæœŸæœ›å€¼ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥Entropyæ˜¯bitsæœŸæœ›å€¼çš„ä¸‹ç•Œã€‚

åœ¨ç‰©ç†ä¸Šæˆ–æ˜¯æ©Ÿå™¨å­¸ç¿’ä¸Šï¼Œæˆ‘å€‘å¸¸ä½¿ç”¨è‡ªç„¶å°æ•¸\(e\)ç•¶ä½œåº•ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥Entropyç‚ºï¼š

$$ H(p)=E_{x\sim p}[-\operatorname{ln}p(x)] \ \ â†ªï¸ã€6ã€‘ $$

å…¶å¯¦å°±åªæ˜¯æŠŠåº¦é‡çš„å–®ä½å¾æ¯”ç‰¹(bits)æ›æˆå¥ˆç‰¹(nats)ï¼Œåªæ˜¯ã€Œç·¨ç¢¼ã€çš„å–®ä½æ”¹è®Šè€Œå·²ï¼Œå…¶æ„ç¾©éƒ½è·Ÿä¸Šè¿°çš„ä¸€æ¨£ã€‚åªæ˜¯å¦‚æœä½¿ç”¨natsç•¶å–®ä½åœ¨è¨ˆç®—ä¸Šæœƒæ–¹ä¾¿è¨±å¤šï¼Œå› ç‚ºè¨±å¤šçš„åˆ†å¸ƒéƒ½å¯ä»¥è¡¨ç¤ºæˆä»¥\(e\)ç‚ºåº•çš„æŒ‡æ•¸ï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚ï¼šNormal Distributionã€‚

é‚„è¨˜å¾—ä¸Šä¸€è¬›ä¸­æˆ‘è«‹å¤§å®¶è¨˜ä½çš„ã€2ã€‘åˆ°ã€4ã€‘å¼å—ï¼Ÿç¾åœ¨å¥—ç”¨åˆ°é€™è£¡çš„ã€6ã€‘ï¼Œå¯å¾—ï¼š

  • é€£çºŒæƒ…å¢ƒä¸‹ï¼ŒÂ \(H=\int -p(x)\operatorname{ln}p(x)dx \ \ â†ªï¸ã€7ã€‘\)
  • é›¢æ•£æƒ…å¢ƒä¸‹ï¼Œ \(H=\sum_i -p_i\operatorname{ln}p_i \ \ â†ªï¸ã€8ã€‘\)
  • å¯¦é©—æƒ…å¢ƒä¸‹ï¼Œ\(H=\sum_k -(\frac{n_k}{N})\operatorname{ln}(\frac{n_k}{N}) \ \ â†ªï¸ã€9ã€‘\)

æœ€å¾Œï¼Œä¾†çœ‹çœ‹ä»€éº¼åˆ†å¸ƒçš„Entropyæœ€å¤§ï¼Œåœ¨çµ¦å®š \(\int p(x)dx=1\) çš„æƒ…æ³ä¸‹è©¦åœ–æ‰¾åˆ°ä¸€å€‹ \(p(x)\) å¯ä»¥ä½¿ Entropy \(H\) æœ€å¤§ï¼Œå¼•å…¥Lagrange Multiplierï¼š

$$ L=\int^{\infty}_{-\infty}-\operatorname{ln}p(x)\cdot p(x)dx+\lambda (\int^{\infty}_{-\infty}p(x)dx-1) $$
$$ =\int^{\infty}_{-\infty}[\lambda p(x)-p(x)\operatorname{ln}(p(x))]dx-\lambda \ \ â†ªï¸ã€11ã€‘ $$

æ¥ä¸‹ä¾†å°ã€11ã€‘å¾®åˆ†æ±‚æ¥µå€¼

$$ 0=\frac{\partial L}{\partial p(x)}|_{p^*(x)}=\int^{\infty}_{-\infty}[\lambda-\operatorname{ln}(p^*(x))-1]dx \ \ â†ªï¸ã€12ã€‘ $$

æ‰€ä»¥

$$ p^*(x)=exp\{\lambda-1\} \ \ â†ªï¸ã€13ã€‘ $$

æ­¤æ™‚çš„åˆ†å¸ƒæ˜¯ä¸€å€‹èˆ‡ \(x\) ç„¡é—œçš„å¸¸æ•¸ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ \(p^*(x)\) æ˜¯ä¸€å€‹Uniform Distributionã€‚æ‰€ä»¥å¹³å‡åˆ†é…æœƒä½¿å¾—ç³»çµ±å¾—åˆ°æœ€å¤§çš„Entropyï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯Uniform Distributionæ˜¯éš¨æ©Ÿæ€§æœ€å¤§çš„åˆ†å¸ƒï¼Œä¹Ÿæ˜¯è³‡è¨Šé‡æœ€å¤§çš„åˆ†å¸ƒ ï¼Œé€™èˆ‡æˆ‘å€‘å‰›å‰›çš„è¨è«–æ˜¯è‡ªæ°çš„ã€‚ï¼ˆæ³¨æ„ï¼šåœ¨æœ‰é™Varianceçš„æƒ…æ³ä¸‹æ˜¯Normal Distributionæœ‰æœ€å¤§Entropyï¼‰

Cross Entropy

æ¥ä¸‹ä¾†èŠèŠå­¸éæ©Ÿå™¨å­¸ç¿’å’Œæ·±åº¦å­¸ç¿’éƒ½çŸ¥é“çš„Cross Entropyï¼Œåœ¨åˆ†é¡å•é¡Œç•¶ä¸­Cross Entropyè¢«å®šç¾©æˆï¼š

$$ Cross\ Entropy=-y\ \operatorname{ln}(q)-(1-y)\operatorname{ln}(1-q) \ \ â†ªï¸ã€14ã€‘ $$

å…¶ä¸­ï¼š\(y_i=0,1\)ç‚ºdataçš„labelsï¼Œ\(q_i\)ç‚ºæ¨¡å‹é æ¸¬çš„è¼¸å‡ºå€¼ã€‚

ä½†å®ƒå…¶å¯¦æœ‰æ›´ä¸€èˆ¬çš„å®šç¾©ï¼š

$$ Cross\ Entropy:\ H(p, q)=E_{x\sim p}[-\operatorname{ln}q(x)] \ \ â†ªï¸ã€15ã€‘ $$

ä¸€èˆ¬\(p(x)\)ä»£è¡¨çš„æ˜¯ç›®æ¨™åˆ†å¸ƒï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯æƒ³è¦å­¸ç¿’çš„æœªçŸ¥åˆ†å¸ƒï¼›è€Œ\(q(x)\)å‰‡ä»£è¡¨æ˜¯æ¨¡å‹çš„è¼¸å‡ºåˆ†å¸ƒã€‚

æˆ‘å€‘å‰›å‰›èªªéEntropyæ˜¯bitsæˆ–natsæœŸæœ›å€¼çš„ä¸‹ç•Œï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ï¼š

$$ H(p,q)=E_{x\sim p}[-\operatorname{ln}q(x)]\geq E_{x\sim p}[-\operatorname{ln}p(x)]=H(p,p)=H(p) \ \ â†ªï¸ã€16ã€‘ $$

æ‰€ä»¥ç•¶æˆ‘å€‘è©¦åœ–æ¸›å°‘Cross Entropyæ™‚ï¼Œå…¶å¯¦å°±æ˜¯è©¦åœ–èª¿æ•´\(q(x)\)ä½¿å…¶æ¥è¿‘\(p(x)\)ï¼Œå› ç‚ºç•¶\(q(x)=p(x)\)æ™‚ï¼Œ\(H(p,q)=H(p)\)æœ‰æœ€å°çš„Cross Entropyã€‚

å»¶çºŒå‰›å‰›ã€Œç·¨ç¢¼ã€çš„æ¦‚å¿µå¥—ç”¨åœ¨Cross Entropyï¼Œä»Šå¤©æˆ‘é›–ç„¶çŸ¥é“ \(-\operatorname{ln}p(x)\)æ˜¯æœ€å¥½çš„ã€Œç·¨ç¢¼ã€ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯æˆ‘ä¸çŸ¥é“ \(p(x)\) é•·ä»€éº¼æ¨£å­ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥é€€ä¸€æ­¥æˆ‘å€‘ä½¿ç”¨æ¨¡å‹çš„ \(q(x)\) ä¾†åšã€Œç·¨ç¢¼ã€ï¼ŒCross Entropyçš„æ„ç¾©å°±æ˜¯åˆ©ç”¨ \(-\operatorname{ln}q(x)\) é€™å¥—ã€Œç·¨ç¢¼ã€å»ç®—ç³»çµ±çš„natsæœŸæœ›å€¼ï¼Œä¸¦ä¸”æƒ³è¾¦æ³•æ”¹å–„ç·¨ç¢¼æ–¹æ³•ä¾†é™ä½Cross Entropyã€‚

æ¥ä¸‹ä¾†æˆ‘æƒ³è¦å¸¶å¤§å®¶å¾å¼ã€15ã€‘åˆ°ã€14ã€‘å°ä¸€éå¼å­ã€‚

å› ç‚ºæˆ‘å€‘çŸ¥é“ç›®æ¨™åˆ†å¸ƒæ˜¯Binaryçš„é›¢æ•£ç³»çµ±ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥å¯ä»¥æŠŠã€15ã€‘å¯«æˆï¼š

$$ H(p,q)=-p_{positive}\cdot \operatorname{ln}(q_{positive})-p_{negative}\cdot \operatorname{ln}(q_{negative}) \ \ â†ªï¸ã€17ã€‘ $$

å› ç‚ºæ˜¯Binary Classificationçš„å•é¡Œï¼Œåªæœ‰å…©ç¨®stateså…¶æ©Ÿç‡ç›¸åˆç‚º1ï¼Œå› æ­¤ï¼š

$$ H(p,q)=-p_{positive}\cdot \operatorname{ln}(q_{positive})-(1-p_{positive})\cdot \operatorname{ln}(1-q_{positive}) \ \ â†ªï¸ã€18ã€‘ $$

æ¥ä¸‹ä¾†ï¼Œ\(p\) æ˜¯ç›®æ¨™åˆ†å¸ƒï¼Œç•¶labelç‚ºpositive (\(y=1\)) å‰‡\(p_{positive}=1\)ï¼Œç•¶labelç‚º (\(y=0\)) negativeå‰‡\(p_{positive}=0\)ï¼›\(q\) æ˜¯æ¨¡å‹é æ¸¬ï¼Œå…¶ç›®æ¨™æ˜¯é æ¸¬positiveçš„å¯èƒ½æ©Ÿç‡ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥æœ€å¾Œå¯«æˆï¼š

$$ H(p,q)=-y\cdot \operatorname{ln}(q)-(1-y)\cdot \operatorname{ln}(1-q) $$

å°±è·Ÿã€14ã€‘å¼ä¸€æ¨¡ä¸€æ¨£äº†ï¼Œé€™è£¡æ³¨æ„ä¸€é»ï¼Œåœ¨æ¨å°çš„éç¨‹ç•¶ä¸­æˆ‘éƒ½ä¸éœ€è¦å»å‡è¨­æ¨¡å‹çš„é•·ç›¸ï¼Œæˆ‘ä¸éœ€è¦å‡è¨­æ¨¡å‹ç‚ºSigmoidï¼Œæ¨å‡ºCross Entropyçš„éç¨‹æ˜¯å’Œæ¨¡å‹çš„é¸æ“‡ç„¡é—œçš„ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥åƒè¬ä¸è¦èªç‚ºé¸æ“‡ä½¿ç”¨Cross Entropyæ˜¯å› ç‚ºSigmoidçš„ç·£æ•…ã€‚é€²ä¸€æ­¥èªªCross Entropyå…¶å¯¦å¯ä»¥ç”¨åœ¨å„ç¨®å•é¡Œï¼ˆæˆ–åˆ†å¸ƒï¼‰ï¼ŒåŒ…æ‹¬ï¼šRegressionå•é¡Œï¼Œæˆ‘å€‘æœƒåœ¨æ¥ä¸‹ä¾†çš„æ–‡ç« è£¡è®“å¤§å®¶çœŸæ­£äº†è§£é€™ä¸€é»ã€‚

KL Divergence (Kullback-Leibler Divergence)

KL Divergenceå°ç¢°éæ·±åº¦å­¸ç¿’ä¸€æ®µæ™‚é–“çš„å¤§å®¶æ‡‰è©²æ˜¯ä¸€å€‹æ—¢ç†Ÿæ‚‰åˆé™Œç”Ÿçš„æ±è¥¿å§ï¼æˆ‘å€‘å°±åœ¨é€™é‚ŠæŠŠå®ƒææ‡‚å§ï¼

å¦‚æœæœ‰å…©å€‹ç¨ç«‹çš„æ©Ÿç‡åˆ†å¸ƒ\(p(x)\)å’Œ\(q(x)\)åŒæ™‚å°æ‡‰åˆ°åŒä¸€å€‹éš¨æ©Ÿè®Šæ•¸\(x\)ï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯å®ƒå€‘æ‰€åœ¨çš„ç©ºé–“æ˜¯ä¸€æ¨£çš„ï¼Œå‰‡å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨KL Divergenceä¾†æ¸¬é‡é€™å…©å€‹åˆ†å¸ƒçš„å·®ç•°ç¨‹åº¦ï¼š

$$ D_{KL}(p||q)=-E_{x\sim p}[\operatorname{ln}q(x)-\operatorname{ln}p(x)]=-E_{x\sim p}[\operatorname{ln}\frac{q(x)}{p(x)}] \ \ â†ªï¸ã€19ã€‘ $$

é€™å€‹å¼å­ä¸å¥½æ‡‚ï¼Œæ²’é—œä¿‚ï¼æˆ‘å€‘ç¨å¾®ä»£æ›ä¸€ä¸‹å¼å­ï¼š

$$ D_{KL}(p||q)=E_{x\sim p}[-\operatorname{ln}q(x)]-E_{x\sim p}[-\operatorname{ln}p(x)]=H(p,q)-H(p) \ \ â†ªï¸ã€20ã€‘ $$

æœ‰çœ‹å‡ºä¾†äº†å—ï¼ŸKL Divergenceå…¶å¯¦å°±æ˜¯Cross Entropyæ‰£æ‰ç›®æ¨™åˆ†å¸ƒçš„Entropyï¼Œæ›´æ·±å±¤çš„èªªï¼ŒKL Divergenceè¡¨ç¤ºçš„æ˜¯ç›®å‰çš„ç·¨ç¢¼æ–¹æ³•æœ€å¤šé‚„å¯ä»¥ä¸‹é™å¤šå°‘natsæœŸæœ›å€¼ã€‚

é›–ç„¶ä½ å¯ä»¥å°‡KL Divergenceè¦–ä½œè·é›¢ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯åš´æ ¼ä¾†èªªå®ƒä¸æ˜¯ï¼Œå› ç‚ºKL Divergenceä¸å…·æœ‰å°ç¨±æ€§ï¼š

$$ D_{KL}(p||q)\neq D_{KL}(q||p) \ \ â†ªï¸ã€21ã€‘ $$

å…¶ä¸­ï¼š

$$ D_{KL}(q||p)ï¼-E_{x\sim q}[\operatorname{ln}p(x)-\operatorname{ln}q(x)]ï¼H(q,p)-H(q) \ \ â†ªï¸ã€22ã€‘ $$

ã€21ã€‘å¼æ„å‘³è‘—å¾\(p(x)\)åˆ°\(q(x)\)æ‰€é™ä½çš„natsæœŸæœ›å€¼èˆ‡å¾\(q(x)\)åˆ°\(p(x)\)æ‰€é™ä½çš„natsæœŸæœ›å€¼ä¸ç›¸ç­‰ã€‚

f-Divergence

Divergenceå…¶å¯¦æœ‰å¤šå€‹å½¢å¼ï¼Œå®šç¾©å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š ç•¶æœ‰å…©å€‹ç¨ç«‹çš„æ©Ÿç‡åˆ†å¸ƒ\(p(x)\)å’Œ\(q(x)\)åŒæ™‚å°æ‡‰åˆ°åŒä¸€å€‹éš¨æ©Ÿè®Šæ•¸\(x\)ï¼Œ

$$ f-divergence:\ D_f(p\|q)=E_{x\sim q}[f(\frac{p(x)}{q(x)})]=\int q(x)f(\frac{p(x)}{q(x)})dx $$

å…¶ä¸­ï¼š\(f(.)\) åªéœ€è¦éµå®ˆå…©æ¢è¦å‰‡å°±å¯ä»¥ï¼š\(f(.)\) æ˜¯Convexçš„ä¸”\(f(1)=0\)ã€‚

  • ç•¶\(f(u)=u\cdot \operatorname{ln}u\)ï¼Œå‰‡
    $$ D_f(p\|q)=\int q(x)(\frac{p(x)}{q(x)})\operatorname{ln}(\frac{p(x)}{q(x)})dx=\int p(x)\operatorname{ln}(\frac{p(x)}{q(x)})dx=D_{KL}(p\|q) $$
    ï¼Œç‚ºKL Divergence
  • ç•¶\(f(u)=-\operatorname{ln}u\)ï¼Œå‰‡
    $$ D_f(p\|q)=-\int q(x)\operatorname{ln}(\frac{p(x)}{q(x)})dx=\int q(x)\operatorname{ln}(\frac{q(x)}{p(x)})dx=D_{KL}(q\|p) $$
    ï¼Œç‚ºReverse KL Divergence
  • ç•¶\(f(u)=(u-1)^2\)ï¼Œå‰‡
    $$ D_f(p\|q)=-\int q(x)(\frac{p(x)}{q(x)}-1)^2dx=\int \frac{(p(x)-q(x))^2}{q(x)}dx $$
    ï¼Œç‚ºChi Square Divergence
  • ç•¶\(f(u)=-(u+1)\operatorname{ln}\frac{u+1}{2}+u\operatorname{ln}u\)ï¼Œå‰‡
    $$ D_f(p\|q)=\frac{1}{2}[D_{KL}(p\|\frac{p+q}{2})+D_{KL}(q\|\frac{p+q}{2})] $$
    ï¼Œç‚º JS Divergence (ç”¨åœ¨GAN)

f-divergenceåœ¨æ„ç¾©ä¸Šä»£è¡¨ï¼šæˆ‘åœ¨modelçš„åˆ†å¸ƒ \(q(x)\) ä¸Šä¼°è¨ˆ \(f(\frac{p(x)}{q(x)})\) ï¼Œ\(f(.)\)æ˜¯ç”¨ä¾†è©•ä¼°åˆ†å¸ƒé–“è·é›¢çš„å‡½æ•¸ï¼Œç•¶\(p(x)=q(x)\)æ™‚è·é›¢ç‚º0 â€” \(f(\frac{p(x)}{q(x)})=0\)ï¼Œç•¶\(p(x)\neq q(x)\)æ™‚è·é›¢ç‚ºæ­£ â€” \(f(\frac{p(x)}{q(x)})> 0\)ã€‚

çµè«–

æ©Ÿå™¨å­¸ç¿’å’Œæ·±åº¦å­¸ç¿’å……åˆ†çš„å€Ÿç”¨äº†è³‡è¨Šç†è«–è£¡å°è³‡è¨Šé‡çš„è¡¡é‡æŠ€è¡“ï¼ŒåŒ…æ‹¬ï¼šEntropyã€Cross Entropyå’ŒKL Divergenceã€‚å› ç‚ºæ©Ÿå™¨å­¸ç¿’ä¸­å……æ–¥è‘—çµ±è¨ˆåˆ†å¸ƒï¼Œè€Œé€™äº›è¡¡é‡æ–¹æ³•å¯ä»¥å¹«åŠ©æˆ‘å€‘åº¦é‡ç¨®ç¨®åˆ†å¸ƒçš„è³‡è¨Šé‡ï¼Œæœ‰äº†é€™æŠŠå°ºæˆ‘å€‘æ‰å¯ä»¥é€²è¡Œå„é¡å„ªåŒ–ä¾†è®“æ©Ÿå™¨å­¸ç¿’ã€‚

  • Entropy: \(H(p)=E_{x\sim p}[-\operatorname{ln}p(x)]\) ï¼Œç‚ºæœ€å°å¯å¾—çš„natsæœŸæœ›å€¼
  • Cross Entropy: \(H(p, q)=E_{x\sim p}[-\operatorname{ln}q(x)]\) ï¼Œåˆ©ç”¨\(q(x)\)ä¾†ç·¨ç¢¼å¯å¾—çš„natsæœŸæœ›å€¼

å…¶å¯¦ï¼Œé€™ä¸€è¬›çš„å…§å®¹å¯ä»¥èªªæ˜¯ç‚ºäº†æ¥ä¸‹ä¾†å¹¾è¬›è€Œç”Ÿï¼Œä¸‹ä¸€è¬›æˆ‘å€‘æœƒé–‹å§‹å¥—ç”¨è³‡è¨Šç†è«–çš„é€™äº›æ¦‚å¿µï¼Œå¸¶å¤§å®¶é‡æ–°äº†è§£å„ªåŒ–å’Œæ“¬åˆæ˜¯æ€éº¼ä¸€å›äº‹ï¼Œæ•¬è«‹æœŸå¾…ï¼

entry.title: å‰–ææ·±åº¦å­¸ç¿’ (1)ï¼šç‚ºä»€éº¼Normal Distributioné€™éº¼å¥½ç”¨ï¼Ÿ
entry.content:
æ·±åº¦å­¸ç¿’ç™¼å±•è‡³ä»Šå·²ç¶“æœ‰ç›¸ç•¶å¤šå¥½ç”¨çš„å¥—ä»¶ï¼Œä½¿å¾—é€²å…¥çš„é–€æª»å¤§å¤§çš„é™ä½ï¼Œå› æ­¤å¦‚æœæƒ³è¦å¿«é€Ÿçš„å¯¦ä½œä¸€äº›æ·±åº¦å­¸ç¿’æˆ–æ©Ÿå™¨å­¸ç¿’ï¼Œé€šå¸¸æ˜¯å¹¾è¡Œç¨‹å¼ç¢¼å¯ä»¥è§£æ±ºçš„äº‹ã€‚ä½†æ˜¯ï¼Œå¦‚æœæƒ³è¦å°‡æ·±åº¦å­¸ç¿’æˆ–æ©Ÿå™¨å­¸ç¿’ç•¶ä½œä¸€ä»½å·¥ä½œï¼Œæ·±å…¥äº†è§£å®ƒèƒŒå¾Œçš„åŸç†å’Œæ•¸å­¸æ˜¯å¿…è¦çš„ï¼Œæ‰æœ‰å¯èƒ½å› åœ°åˆ¶å®œçš„éˆæ´»é‹ç”¨ï¼ŒYCæº–å‚™åœ¨é€™ä¸€ç³»åˆ—ç•¶ä¸­å¸¶å¤§å®¶æ·±å…¥å‰–ææ·±åº¦å­¸ç¿’ã€‚

é¦–å…ˆç¬¬ä¸€è¬›ï¼Œæˆ‘å€‘ä¾†èŠä¸€å€‹æœ€å¸¸è¦‹çš„åˆ†å¸ƒâ€”æ­£æ…‹åˆ†å¸ƒï¼ˆNormal Distributionï¼‰ï¼Œä¹Ÿç¨±ç‚ºé«˜æ–¯åˆ†å¸ƒï¼ˆGaussian Distributionï¼‰ã€‚

å¦‚æœä½ å·²ç¶“å­¸äº†å¥½ä¸€é™£å­çš„æ©Ÿå™¨å­¸ç¿’æˆ–æ·±åº¦å­¸ç¿’ï¼Œæ‡‰è©²å°æ–¼Normal Distributionä¸é™Œç”Ÿï¼Œä½†æ˜¯ä½ çœŸçš„æ‡‚Normal Distributionå—ï¼Ÿ

  • ç‚ºä»€éº¼Normal Distributioné€šå¸¸ä½œç‚ºé›œè¨Šçš„åˆ†å¸ƒï¼Ÿ
  • ç‚ºä½•åœ¨DLï¼ˆdeep learningï¼‰ï¼Œåƒæ•¸çš„åˆå§‹åŒ–è¦ç”¨Normal Distributionï¼Ÿ
  • ç‚ºä½•åœ¨Bayesianå…¬å¼è£¡å¸¸å¸¸æœƒä½¿ç”¨Normal Distributionç•¶ä½œPrior Probabilityï¼Ÿ
  • åœ¨ä½¿ç”¨GANï¼ˆgenerative adversarial networkï¼‰æ™‚ï¼Œç‚ºä»€éº¼çµ¦äºˆçš„è¼¸å…¥è¦å‡è¨­Normal Distributionï¼Ÿ

å¦‚æœä½ ä¸çŸ¥é“ç‚ºä»€éº¼ä½¿ç”¨Normal Distributionï¼Œä½ ç”¨èµ·ä¾†ä¸æœƒæ€•å—ï¼Ÿé€™ä¸€è¬›æˆ‘æƒ³è¦å›ç­”çš„æ˜¯ï¼šç‚ºä»€éº¼Normal Distributioné€™éº¼å¥½ç”¨ï¼Ÿç”šè‡³å·²ç¶“åˆ°äº†ç„¡è…¦ç”¨çš„ç¨‹åº¦ï¼Œæˆ‘æœƒå¾çµ±è¨ˆå­¸å’Œè³‡è¨Šç†è«–ä¾†å›ç­”é€™å€‹å•é¡Œã€‚

Courtesy Nas Mouti

èªè­˜Normal Distribution

é¦–å…ˆä¾†çœ‹çœ‹Normal Distributionçš„æ•¸å­¸è¡¨ç¤ºå¼

$$ p_{normal}(x)=\frac{1}{\sqrt{2\pi}\sigma}exp\{{-\frac{1}{2\sigma^2}(x-\mu)^2}\} \ \ â†ªï¸ã€1ã€‘ $$

å…¶ä¸­ï¼š\(\mu\) å‰›å¥½æ˜¯Normal Distributionçš„ Meanï¼ˆå¹³å‡å€¼ï¼‰ï¼Œ\(\sigma^2\) å‰›å¥½æ˜¯Normal Distributionçš„ Varianceï¼ˆæ–¹å·®ï¼‰ï¼Œä¾†è­‰æ˜ä¸€ä¸‹å§ï¼

è­‰æ˜ä¹‹å‰ï¼Œå…ˆä¾†äº†è§£ä»€éº¼æ˜¯ã€ŒæœŸæœ›å€¼ã€ï¼ŒæœŸæœ›å€¼æŒ‡çš„æ˜¯åœ¨ç›¸åŒå ´æ™¯ä¸‹éš¨æ©Ÿè©¦é©—å¤šæ¬¡ï¼Œæ‰€æœ‰é‚£äº›å¯èƒ½ç‹€æ…‹çš„å¹³å‡çµæœã€‚æœŸæœ›å€¼ \(E[g(x)]\) è·Ÿå…©ä»¶äº‹æœ‰é—œï¼šè©¦é©—çš„ç‰©ç†é‡ \(g(x)\) å’Œè©¦é©—çš„å‡ºç¾æ©Ÿç‡ \(p(x)\) ã€‚

é€£çºŒå½¢å¼å¯«æˆï¼š

$$ E[g(x)]\equiv\int^{\infty}_{-\infty}g(x)\cdot p(x)dx \ \ â†ªï¸ã€2ã€‘ $$

å¦å¤–æœŸæœ›å€¼ä¹Ÿæœ‰é›¢æ•£çš„å½¢å¼ï¼š

$$ E[g]\equiv \sum_{i}g_i\cdot p_i \ \ â†ªï¸ã€3ã€‘ $$

ä¸Šé¢å…©å€‹å¼å­æœ‰å€‹å‰ææ˜¯å·²çŸ¥æ©Ÿç‡åˆ†å¸ƒ \(p(x)\) æˆ– \(p_i\) çš„æƒ…æ³ä¸‹æ‰èƒ½ä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œå¦‚æœä»Šå¤©æˆ‘å€‘ä¸çŸ¥é“æ©Ÿç‡åˆ†å¸ƒï¼Œåªèƒ½ä½¿ç”¨å¯¦é©—çš„æ–¹æ³•æ±‚è¿‘ä¼¼çš„æœŸæœ›å€¼ï¼Œæ­¤æ™‚\(p_i\)å¯ä»¥ç”¨æ¡æ¨£ä¾†å–ä»£ï¼Œå‰‡è®Šæ›å¼ã€3ã€‘ç‚ºä»¥ä¸‹å…¬å¼ï¼š

$$ E[g]= \frac{1}{N}\sum_{i=1}^{N}g_i \ \ â†ªï¸ã€4ã€‘ $$

è«‹å¤§å®¶ç‰¢è¨˜ä¸Šé¢ä¸‰å€‹å¼å­ï¼Œåœ¨æ©Ÿå™¨å­¸ç¿’ä¸­æœƒåè¦†ä½¿ç”¨åˆ°ã€‚

æœ‰äº†æœŸæœ›å€¼çš„æ¦‚å¿µï¼Œæˆ‘å€‘é–‹å§‹ä¾†çœ‹Meanå’ŒVarianceçš„å®šç¾©

Meançš„å®šç¾©ç‚º

$$ E[x]\equiv\int^{\infty}_{-\infty}x\cdot p(x)dx \ \ â†ªï¸ã€5ã€‘ $$

ä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯æ±‚ç‰©ç†é‡ \(x\) çš„æœŸæœ›å€¼ã€‚

Varianceçš„å®šç¾©ç‚º

$$ Var[x]\equiv E[(x-E[x])^2] \ \ â†ªï¸ã€6ã€‘ $$

å°‡ä¸Šå¼åŒ–ç´„å¯å¾—

$$ Var[x]=E[x^2]-E[x]^2 \ \ â†ªï¸ã€7ã€‘ $$

å…¶ä¸­ï¼š\(E[x^2]\equiv\int^{\infty}_{-\infty}x^2p(x)dx\)ã€‚

æ¥ä¸‹ä¾†åªè¦æŠŠå¼ã€1ã€‘çš„Normal Distributionä»£å…¥å°±å¯ä»¥å¾—åˆ°å®ƒçš„Meanå’ŒVarianceã€‚

åœ¨é€™ä¹‹å‰ï¼Œæˆ‘å€‘å…ˆä¾†çœ‹ä¸€å€‹é‡è¦çš„ç©åˆ†å¼ï¼š

$$ \int^{\infty}_{-\infty}exp\{-a(x+b)^2\}dx=\sqrt{\frac{\pi}{a}} \ \ â†ªï¸ã€8ã€‘ $$

ä¸Šè¿°å¼å­è­‰æ˜ç¨å«Œè¤‡é›œï¼Œæœ‰èˆˆè¶£çš„è©³è¦‹ç¶­åŸºç™¾ç§‘çš„è­‰æ˜ã€‚

å…ˆçœ‹çœ‹Normal Distributionæ˜¯ä¸æ˜¯æ©Ÿç‡ç¸½å’Œç‚º1

å°‡å¼ã€1ã€‘åšç©åˆ†

$$ \int^{\infty}_{-\infty}p_{normal}(x)dx=\frac{1}{\sqrt{2\pi}\sigma}\int^{\infty}_{-\infty}exp\{{-\frac{1}{2\sigma^2}(x-\mu)^2}\}dx $$

æ¥ä¸‹ä¾†ä»¤\(a=\frac{1}{2\sigma^2}\)ã€\(b=-\mu\)ï¼Œæ­¤æ™‚å¯ä»¥å¥—ç”¨å¼ã€8ã€‘ï¼Œå¾—

$$ \int^{\infty}_{-\infty}p_{normal}(x)dx=\frac{1}{\sqrt{2\pi}\sigma}\sqrt{\frac{\pi}{\frac{1}{2\sigma^2}}}=1 \ \ â†ªï¸ã€9ã€‘ $$

å†ä¾†æ±‚å…¶Mean

$$ E_{x\sim normal}[x]=\int^{\infty}_{-\infty}x\cdot p_{normal}(x)dx=\frac{1}{\sqrt{2\pi}\sigma}\int^{\infty}_{-\infty}x\cdot exp\{{-\frac{1}{2\sigma^2}(x-\mu)^2}\}dx $$

ä»¤\(s=x-\mu\) ä»£å…¥ä¸Šå¼ï¼Œå¾—

$$ =\frac{1}{\sqrt{2\pi}\sigma}\int^{\infty}_{-\infty}(s+\mu)\cdot exp\{{-\frac{1}{2\sigma^2}s^2}\}ds $$
$$ =\frac{1}{\sqrt{2\pi}\sigma}[\int^{\infty}_{-\infty}s\cdot exp\{{-\frac{1}{2\sigma^2}s^2}\}ds+\int^{\infty}_{-\infty}\mu\cdot exp\{{-\frac{1}{2\sigma^2}s^2}\}ds] $$

ä¸Šå¼çš„ç¬¬ä¸€é …å¿…ç‚º0ï¼Œå› ç‚º\(s\)å°åŸé»ç‚ºå¥‡å°ç¨±ï¼Œè€Œ\(exp\{{-\frac{1}{2\sigma^2}s^2}\}\)å°åŸé»ç‚ºå¶å°ç¨±ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥\(s\cdot exp\{{-\frac{1}{2\sigma^2}s^2}\}\)ç‚ºå¥‡å°ç¨±ï¼Œç©åˆ†å¾Œæœƒç›¸äº’æŠµéŠ·ç‚º0ã€‚æ¥ä¸‹ä¾†æŠŠç¬¬äºŒé …çš„\(s\)é‚„åŸå›å»ï¼Œå¾—

$$ =\mu\int^{\infty}_{-\infty} \frac{1}{\sqrt{2\pi}\sigma}exp\{{-\frac{1}{2\sigma^2}(x-\mu)^2}\}dx=\mu \int^{\infty}_{-\infty}p_{normal}(x)dx $$

å°‡å¼ã€9ã€‘ä»£å…¥ï¼Œæœ€å¾Œå¾—åˆ°

$$ E_{x\sim normal}[x]=\mu \ \ â†ªï¸ã€10ã€‘ $$

æœ€å¾Œä¾†ç®—ä¸€ä¸‹Variance

$$ Var_{x\sim normal}[x]=E_{x\sim normal}[x^2]-E_{x\sim normal}[x]^2 \ \ â†ªï¸ã€11ã€‘ $$

ç¬¬ä¸€é …

$$ E_{x\sim normal}[x^2]=\int^{\infty}_{-\infty}x^2p_{normal}(x)dx=\frac{1}{\sqrt{2\pi}\sigma}\int^{\infty}_{-\infty}x^2\cdot exp\{{-\frac{1}{2\sigma^2}(x-\mu)^2}\}dx $$

ä»¤\(a=\frac{1}{2\sigma^2}\)ã€\(s=x -\mu\)

$$ =\sqrt{\frac{a}{\pi}}\int^{\infty}_{-\infty}(s+\mu)^2\cdot exp\{{-a \cdot s^2}\}ds $$

å±•é–‹

$$ =\sqrt{\frac{a}{\pi}}[\int^{\infty}_{-\infty}s^2\cdot exp\{{-a \cdot s^2}\}ds+\int^{\infty}_{-\infty}2s\mu\cdot exp\{{-a \cdot s^2}\}ds+\int^{\infty}_{-\infty}\mu^2\cdot exp\{{-a \cdot s^2}\}ds] $$

ç¬¬äºŒé …çš„ç©åˆ†è£¡é¢æ˜¯å¥‡å‡½æ•¸ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ç¬¬äºŒé …ç©åˆ†å®Œçš„çµæœæ˜¯0ã€‚ç¬¬ä¸‰é …æŠŠ\(\mu^2\)æå‡ºå»ï¼Œç©åˆ†çš„éƒ¨åˆ†å…¶å¯¦å°±æ˜¯å¼ã€9ã€‘ã€‚å¾—

$$ E_{x\sim normal}[x^2]=\sqrt{\frac{a}{\pi}}\int^{\infty}_{-\infty}s^2\cdot exp\{{-a \cdot s^2}\}ds+\mu^2 $$

æ¥ä¸‹ä¾†æœ‰é»trickyï¼Œä¸Šå¼çš„ç¬¬ä¸€é …å¯çœ‹æˆä¸€å€‹å¾®åˆ†å½¢å¼

$$ =\sqrt{\frac{a}{\pi}}\frac{-\partial}{\partial a}(\int^{\infty}_{-\infty} exp\{{-a \cdot s^2}\}ds)+\mu^2=\sqrt{\frac{a}{\pi}}\frac{-\partial}{\partial a}(\sqrt{\frac{\pi}{a}})+\mu^2=\frac{1}{2a}+\mu^2 $$

æ‰€ä»¥

$$ E_{x\sim normal}[x^2]=\sigma^2+\mu^2 \ \ â†ªï¸ã€12ã€‘ $$

å°‡ã€12ã€‘å’Œã€10ã€‘ä»£å…¥ã€11ã€‘ï¼Œå¯å¾—

$$ Var_{x\sim normal}[x]=\sigma^2+\mu^2-(\mu)^2=\sigma^2 \ \ â†ªï¸ã€13ã€‘ $$

æ‰€ä»¥æœªä¾†ç•¶ä½ çœ‹åˆ°Normal Distributionçš„å…¬å¼æ™‚ï¼Œæ‡‰è©²èƒ½å¤ é¦¬ä¸Šçœ‹å‡ºä»–çš„Meanå’ŒVarianceã€‚

éš¨æ©Ÿèª¤å·®å¤§éƒ½å‘ˆç¾Normal Distribution

é›–ç„¶èªªä¸¦éæ‰€æœ‰çš„éš¨æ©Ÿåˆ†å¸ƒéƒ½æ˜¯Normal Distributionã€‚ä¾‹å¦‚æœ‰ï¼šé©ç”¨æ–¼äºŒå…ƒç³»çµ±çš„Bernoulli Distributionï¼›é©ç”¨æ–¼è¨ˆæ•¸ç³»çµ±çš„Poisson Distributionï¼›é©ç”¨æ–¼æ™‚é–“é–“éš”çš„Gamma Distributionï¼›...ç­‰ç­‰ã€‚

ä½†æ˜¯å¤§å¤šæ•¸æƒ…æ³ä¸‹ï¼Œæ²’æœ‰ç‰¹åˆ¥çš„ç†ç”±ï¼Œéš¨æ©Ÿèª¤å·®æœƒéµå¾ªNormal Distributionã€‚

æ¥ä¸‹ä¾†æˆ‘è¦è©¦è‘—ç”¨ä¸­å¤®æ¥µé™å®šç†ä¾†è§£é‡‹é€™å€‹ç¾è±¡ã€‚

å…ˆå¾ä¸­å¤®æ¥µé™å®šç†ï¼ˆCentral Limit Theormï¼‰é–‹å§‹è¬›èµ·

Central Limit Theorm:

Let \(\{x_1,x_2,...,x_n\}\) be a random sample of size \(n\) â€” that is, a sequence of independent and identically distributed (i.i.d.) random variables drawn from a distribution of expected value \(E[x_i]=\mu\) and variance \(Var[x_i]=\sigma^2<\infty\). Suppose we are interested in the sample average: \(S_n=(x_1+x_2+...+x_n)/n\) , Then as \(n\rightarrow \infty\) , \(S_n\) follows normal distribution \(p_{normal}(\mu,(\frac{\sigma}{\sqrt{n}})^2)\).

ä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯èªªï¼Œä»Šå¤©æˆ‘å€‘å¾ä¸€å€‹ä»»æ„åˆ†å¸ƒ \(p(x)\) ç•¶ä¸­æ¡æ¨£ \(n\) ç­†ï¼Œé€™\(n\)ç­†æ¡æ¨£çš„éç¨‹ç¬¦åˆä¸äº’ç›¸å½±éŸ¿å½¼æ­¤ï¼ˆindependentï¼‰ä¸”éƒ½å¾åŒä¸€åˆ†å¸ƒè€Œä¾†ï¼ˆidentically distributedï¼‰ï¼Œå³ i.i.d.ã€‚

è€Œå¦‚æœæˆ‘å€‘å·²çŸ¥é€™å€‹ä»»æ„åˆ†å¸ƒ \(p(x)\) çš„Mean \(E_{x\sim p(x)}[x]=\mu\) å’Œ Variance \(Var_{x\sim p(x)}[x]=\sigma^2<\infty\)ï¼Œæ³¨æ„ï¼š\(p(x)\) ä¸ä¸€å®šéœ€è¦æ˜¯Normal Distributionæ‰èƒ½ç®—Meanå’ŒVarianceã€‚

æˆ‘å€‘é—œæ³¨é€™\(n\)ç­†æ¡æ¨£çš„å¹³å‡å€¼ï¼Œè¨ˆä½œ\(S_n\)ï¼Œçµ±è¨ˆå­¸å‘Šè¨´æˆ‘å€‘ï¼š

$$ E[S_n]=\mu \ \ â†ªï¸ã€14ã€‘ $$
$$ Var[S_n]=\frac{\sigma^2}{n} \ \ â†ªï¸ã€15ã€‘ $$

ç•¶\(n=1\)æ™‚ï¼Œ\(S_n\)çš„åˆ†å¸ƒå…¶å¯¦å°±æ˜¯ \(p(x)\) çš„åˆ†å¸ƒï¼Œç•¶ç„¶Meanå’ŒVarianceæœƒå’ŒåŸåˆ†å¸ƒ \(p(x)\) ä¸€æ¨¡ä¸€æ¨£ã€‚

ä¸­å¤®æ¥µé™å®šç†å‘Šè¨´æˆ‘å€‘å¦‚æœä»Šå¤©æ¡æ¨£æ•¸é‡ \(n\) å¢åŠ åˆ°ä¸€å®šçš„é‡ï¼Œ\(S_n\)çš„åˆ†å¸ƒæœƒè¶¨è¿‘æ–¼Normal Distributionï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯èªªéš¨è‘— \(n\) çš„å¢åŠ ï¼Œ\(S_n\) çš„åˆ†å¸ƒæœƒå¾ \(p(x)\) è®Šæˆæ¥è¿‘ \(p_{normal}(\mu,(\frac{\sigma}{\sqrt{n}})^2)\) åˆ†å¸ƒã€‚

çœ¼è¦‹ç‚ºæ†‘ï¼Œæ¥ä¸‹ä¾†æˆ‘è¦é€éSeeing-Theoryé€™å€‹ç¶²ç«™ä¾†Demoä¸€ä¸‹ä¸­å¤®æ¥µé™å®šç†ï¼Œ

çµ¦å®šä¸€å€‹æ¡æ¨£åˆ†å¸ƒï¼ˆé»ƒè‰²ï¼‰ï¼Œæ¯æ¬¡æ¡æ¨£ \(n=15\) ä½œå¹³å‡ä¸¦æ‰“é»è¨˜ä¸‹ä¾†ï¼Œç¶“éå¤šæ¬¡çš„æ“ä½œå°±å¯ä»¥å¾—åˆ°ç´¯ç©åˆ†å¸ƒåœ–ï¼ˆç´…è‰²ï¼‰ï¼Œè€Œå› ç‚º \(n\) å¤ å¤§ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥é€™å€‹ç´¯ç©åˆ†å¸ƒåœ–æœƒé€¼è¿‘æ–¼Normal Distributionã€‚

å†ä¾†çœ‹çœ‹æ¡æ¨£å¹³å‡çš„ç´¯ç©åˆ†å¸ƒæ€éº¼éš¨è‘— \(n\) å¢åŠ è€Œæ”¹è®Š

è§€å¯Ÿä¸Šé¢çš„å‹•åœ–ï¼Œæœƒç™¼ç¾ \(n\) è¶Šå¤§ï¼ŒVarianceè¶Šä¾†è¶Šå°ï¼Œè€Œä¸”åˆ†å¸ƒç‹€æ³ä¹Ÿè¶Šæ¥è¿‘Normal Distributionã€‚

å¥½ï¼è¬›äº†é€™éº¼å¤šï¼Œé‚£é€™è·Ÿéš¨æ©Ÿèª¤å·®æœ‰ä»€éº¼é—œä¿‚å‘¢ï¼Ÿ

ä¸­å¤®æ¥µé™å®šç†å‘Šè¨´æˆ‘å€‘åªè¦å¾ä¸€å€‹å›ºå®šçš„æ¡æ¨£åˆ†å¸ƒç•¶ä¸­ä½œå¤ å¤šçš„æ¨£æœ¬å¹³å‡ï¼Œå…¶åˆ†å¸ƒæœƒæ¥è¿‘Normal Distributionã€‚

è€Œè‡ªç„¶ç•Œçš„å·¨è§€ç¾è±¡å¾€å¾€æ˜¯æºè‡ªæ–¼å¾®è§€ç¾è±¡çš„ç´¯ç©ï¼Œæˆ‘å€‘é‡æ¸¬çš„ç‰©ç†é‡å¸¸å¸¸ä¾†è‡ªæ–¼å¤šå€‹å¾®å°è²¢ç»ç–ŠåŠ è€Œæˆï¼Œè€Œä¸ç®¡é€™äº›å¾®å°è²¢ç»æœ¬èº«çš„åˆ†å¸ƒç‹€æ³å¦‚ä½•ï¼Œå…¶å·¨è§€çš„ç‰©ç†é‡å› ç‚ºä¸­å¤®æ¥µé™å®šç†è€Œæˆç‚ºNormal Distributionï¼Œé€™ä¹Ÿæ˜¯ç‚ºä»€éº¼ã€Œéš¨æ©Ÿèª¤å·®å¤§éƒ½å‘ˆç¾Normal Distributionã€çš„åŸå› ã€‚

èˆ‰ä¾‹ï¼Œé›»å£“å°±æ˜¯åæ‡‰é›»è·ç–ŠåŠ çš„ç‰©ç†é‡ï¼Œç”¨æ™®é€šæ–¹æ³•æˆ‘å€‘æ˜¯å¾ˆé›£é‡åˆ°å–®ä¸€é›»è·çš„ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥æˆ‘å€‘èƒ½é‡åˆ°çš„å·²ç¶“æ˜¯ç–ŠåŠ éå¾Œçš„çµæœï¼Œä¹Ÿå› æ­¤é›»å£“çš„éš¨æ©Ÿåˆ†å¸ƒæ‰å‘ˆç¾Normal Distributionã€‚

æ‰€ä»¥ï¼Œå¦‚æœä»Šå¤©ä½ æ²’æœ‰ç‰¹åˆ¥çš„ç†ç”±ï¼Œå‡è¨­Normal Distributionå¾€å¾€æ˜¯æœ€æ¥è¿‘çœŸå¯¦çš„ï¼Œé€™æ˜¯ç¬¬ä¸€å€‹ç†ç”±èƒ½è®“ä½ ç„¡è…¦ä½¿ç”¨Normal Distributionï¼Œé‚„æœ‰ç¬¬äºŒå€‹ç†ç”±æˆ‘å€‘æ¥ä¸‹å»è¨è«–ã€‚

Normal Distributionæ˜¯æ‰€æœ‰æ©Ÿç‡åˆ†å¸ƒç•¶ä¸­å‡è¨­æœ€å°‘çš„

é¦–å…ˆä¾†çœ‹ä¸€æ®µå¾Goodfellowçš„æ›¸ä¸­çš„ä¸€æ®µè©±ï¼Œé€™æ®µè©±æ¸…æ¥šçš„å‘Šè¨´æˆ‘å€‘é¸æ“‡ç”¨Normal Distributionçš„ç†ç”±

First, many distributions we wish to model are truly close to being normal distributions. The central limit theorem shows that the sum of many independent random variables is approximately normally distributed. This means that in practice, many complicated systems can be modeled successfully as normally distributed noise, even if the system can be decomposed into parts with more structured behavior.

Second, out of all possible probability distributions with the same variance, the normal distribution encodes the maximum amount of uncertainty over the real numbers. We can thus think of the normal distribution as being the one that inserts the least amount of prior knowledge into a model.

-- from: Deep Learning 3.9.3

ä¸Šè¿°çš„ç¬¬ä¸€æ®µå°±æ˜¯å‰›å‰›æˆ‘å€‘è¨è«–çš„é‚£äº›ï¼Œè€Œæˆ‘å€‘æ¥ä¸‹å»è¦è¨è«–çš„å°±æ˜¯ç¬¬äºŒæ®µçš„å…§å®¹ã€‚

ç¸½çµä¸€ä¸‹Goodfellowåœ¨ç¬¬äºŒæ®µèªªçš„å…§å®¹ï¼š

åœ¨æ‰€æœ‰æœ‰ç›¸åŒVarianceçš„åˆ†å¸ƒç•¶ä¸­ï¼Œ

  • Normal Distributionæ˜¯éš¨æ©Ÿæ€§æœ€å¤§çš„åˆ†å¸ƒ
  • Normal Distributionæ˜¯æœ€å°‘å…ˆé©—çŸ¥è­˜ï¼ˆPrior Knowledgeï¼‰å‡è¨­çš„

è¦è¨è«–é€™å€‹å•é¡Œï¼Œæˆ‘å€‘å¿…é ˆå…ˆäº†è§£ä¸€äº›è³‡è¨Šç†è«–ã€‚

åœ¨è³‡è¨Šç†è«–ç•¶ä¸­ï¼Œæˆ‘å€‘å¸¸å¸¸ä½¿ç”¨Entropyï¼ˆç†µï¼‰ä¾†è¡¡é‡éš¨æ©Ÿæ€§ï¼ŒEntropyçš„å®šç¾©ç‚º

$$ H\equiv E[-ln\ p(x)] \ \ â†ªï¸ã€16ã€‘ $$

å› ç‚ºç¯‡å¹…çš„ç·£æ•…ï¼ŒEntropyçš„å®Œæ•´ä»‹ç´¹æœƒåœ¨æ¥ä¸‹ä¾†çš„æ–‡ç« ä¸­ä»‹ç´¹ï¼Œè«‹å¤§å®¶å…ˆæŠŠé€™å€‹å®šç¾©èƒŒèµ·ä¾†ã€‚

é€éå¼ã€2ã€‘å¯ä»¥å°‡Entropyå¯«æˆé€£çºŒå½¢å¼ï¼š

$$ H_{x\sim p(x)}=E[-ln\ p(x)]=- \int^{\infty}_{-\infty}ln\ p(x)\cdot p(x)dx \ \ â†ªï¸ã€17ã€‘ $$

æ¥ä¸‹ä¾†å°‡Normal Distribution ã€1ã€‘å¼ä»£å…¥ã€17ã€‘

$$ H_{x\sim normal}=- \int^{\infty}_{-\infty}p_{normal}(x)\cdot ln\ p_{normal}(x) dx $$
$$ =- \int^{\infty}_{-\infty}\frac{1}{\sqrt{2\pi}\sigma}exp\{{-\frac{1}{2\sigma^2}(x-\mu)^2}\} \cdot [ln(\frac{1}{\sqrt{2\pi}\sigma})-\frac{1}{2\sigma^2}(x-\mu)^2]dx $$
$$ =ln(\sqrt{2\pi}\sigma)+ \frac{1}{2\sigma^2} \int^{\infty}_{-\infty}\frac{1}{\sqrt{2\pi}\sigma}exp\{{-\frac{1}{2\sigma^2}(x-\mu)^2}\} \cdot (x-\mu)^2dx $$
$$ =ln(\sqrt{2\pi}\sigma)+ \frac{1}{2\sigma^2} E_{x\sim normal}[(x-\mu)^2] $$
$$ =ln(\sqrt{2\pi}\sigma)+ \frac{1}{2\sigma^2} Var_{x\sim normal}[x] $$
$$ H_{x\sim normal}=ln(\sqrt{2\pi}\sigma)+\frac{1}{2}=\frac{1}{2}ln(2\pi e\sigma^2) \ \ â†ªï¸ã€18ã€‘ $$

æˆ‘å€‘å› æ­¤å¾—åˆ°äº†Normal Distribution çš„Entropyï¼Œè€Œé€™å€‹Entropyæ˜¯æ‰€æœ‰æœ‰ç›¸åŒVarianceçš„åˆ†å¸ƒç•¶ä¸­æœ€å¤§çš„ã€‚ç·Šæ¥è‘—ä¾†è­‰æ˜é€™ä»¶äº‹ã€‚

å›åˆ°å¼ã€17ã€‘ï¼Œæˆ‘å€‘å¯ä»¥åˆ—å‡ºä¸€å€‹æœ‰é™åˆ¶æ¢ä»¶çš„å„ªåŒ–å•é¡Œï¼š

åœ¨çµ¦å®šï¼š

  • \(\int p(x)dx=1 \ \ â†ªï¸ã€19ã€‘\)
  • \(E[x]=\mu \ \ â†ªï¸ã€20ã€‘\)
  • \(Var[x]=\sigma^2 \ \ â†ªï¸ã€21ã€‘\)

çš„æƒ…æ³ä¸‹è©¦åœ–æ‰¾åˆ°ä¸€å€‹ \(p(x)\) å¯ä»¥ä½¿ Entropy \(H\) æœ€å¤§ï¼š

$$ p^*(x) = argmax_{p(x)}\ H_{x\sim p(x)}=argmin_{p(x)}\int^{\infty}_{-\infty}ln\ p(x)\cdot p(x)dx \ \ â†ªï¸ã€22ã€‘ $$

å¼•å…¥Lagrange Multiplierçµåˆã€19ã€‘,ã€20ã€‘,ã€21ã€‘,ã€22ã€‘ï¼š

$$ L=\int^{\infty}_{-\infty}ln\ p(x)\cdot p(x)dx-\lambda_1 (\int^{\infty}_{-\infty}p(x)dx-1)-\lambda_2(\int^{\infty}_{-\infty}x\cdot p(x)dx-\mu)-\lambda_3(\int^{\infty}_{-\infty}(x-\mu)^2\cdot p(x)dx-\sigma^2) $$
$$ =\int^{\infty}_{-\infty}[-\lambda_1 p(x)-\lambda_2 p(x)x-\lambda_3 p(x)(x-\mu)^2+p(x)ln(p(x))]dx+\lambda_1 +\mu\lambda_2+\sigma^2\lambda_3 \ \ â†ªï¸ã€23ã€‘ $$

æ¥ä¸‹ä¾†å°ã€23ã€‘å¾®åˆ†æ±‚æ¥µå€¼

$$ 0=\frac{\partial L}{\partial p(x)}|_{p^*(x)}=\int^{\infty}_{-\infty}[-\lambda_1-\lambda_2 x-\lambda_3 (x-\mu)^2+ln(p^*(x))+1]dx \ \ â†ªï¸ã€24ã€‘ $$

æ‰€ä»¥

$$ p^*(x)=exp\{\lambda_1+\lambda_2 x+\lambda_3 (x-\mu)^2-1\} \ \ â†ªï¸ã€25ã€‘ $$

ä¸Šé¢é‚„æœ‰ä¸‰å€‹æœªçŸ¥è®Šæ•¸ \(\lambda_1\), \(\lambda_2\), \(\lambda_3\) ï¼Œé€™äº›è®Šæ•¸å¿…é ˆæ»¿è¶³Constraintsï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥å°‡ã€25ã€‘ä»£å…¥ ã€19ã€‘,ã€20ã€‘,ã€21ã€‘å¾—ä¸‰å€‹æ–¹ç¨‹æ±‚è§£ä¸‰å€‹è®Šæ•¸ï¼Œå¯å¾—ï¼š

$$ \lambda_1=1-ln(\sqrt{2\pi}\sigma);\ \lambda_2=0;\ \lambda_3=-\frac{1}{2\sigma^2} \ \ â†ªï¸ã€26ã€‘ $$

æœ€å¾Œå°‡ã€26ã€‘å›ä»£ã€25ã€‘å°±æœƒå¾—åˆ°å‰›å‰›å¥½æ˜¯Normal Distributionï¼ŒğŸ¥³

å› æ­¤é€™é‚Šæˆ‘å€‘è­‰æ˜äº†ï¼šåœ¨çµ¦å®šMeanå’ŒVarianceä¸‹ï¼ŒNormal Distributionç‚ºæ‰€æœ‰åˆ†å¸ƒç•¶ä¸­Entropyæœ€å¤§çš„ã€‚é€™ä¹ŸåŒæ™‚æ„å‘³è‘—ï¼ŒNormal Distributionæ˜¯éš¨æ©Ÿæ€§æœ€å¤§çš„ï¼ŒNormal Distributionæ˜¯é¡å¤–å‡è¨­æœ€å°‘çš„ã€‚

  • ä¸­å¤®æ¥µé™å®šç†å‘Šè¨´æˆ‘å€‘ï¼šå¦‚æœä»Šå¤©æ¡æ¨£æ•¸é‡ \(n\) å¢åŠ åˆ°ä¸€å®šçš„é‡ï¼Œ\(S_n\)çš„åˆ†å¸ƒæœƒè¶¨è¿‘æ–¼Normal Distribution
  • è‡ªç„¶ç•Œçš„å·¨è§€ç¾è±¡å¾€å¾€æ˜¯æºè‡ªæ–¼å¾®è§€ç¾è±¡çš„ç´¯ç©ï¼Œæˆ‘å€‘é‡æ¸¬çš„ç‰©ç†é‡å¸¸å¸¸ä¾†è‡ªæ–¼å¤šå€‹å¾®å°è²¢ç»ç–ŠåŠ è€Œæˆï¼Œè€Œä¸ç®¡é€™äº›å¾®å°è²¢ç»æœ¬èº«çš„åˆ†å¸ƒç‹€æ³å¦‚ä½•ï¼Œå…¶å·¨è§€çš„ç‰©ç†é‡å› ç‚ºä¸­å¤®æ¥µé™å®šç†è€Œæˆç‚ºNormal Distributionï¼Œé€™ä¹Ÿæ˜¯ç‚ºä»€éº¼ã€Œéš¨æ©Ÿèª¤å·®å¤§éƒ½å‘ˆç¾Normal Distributionã€çš„åŸå› 
  • Entropyæ˜¯è¡¡é‡éš¨æ©Ÿæ€§çš„æŒ‡æ¨™ï¼Œå®šç¾©ç‚ºï¼š\(H\equiv E[-ln\ p(x)]\)
  • åœ¨çµ¦å®šMeanå’ŒVarianceä¸‹ï¼ŒNormal Distributionç‚ºæ‰€æœ‰åˆ†å¸ƒç•¶ä¸­Entropyæœ€å¤§çš„ã€‚é€™ä¹ŸåŒæ™‚æ„å‘³è‘—ï¼ŒNormal Distributionæ˜¯éš¨æ©Ÿæ€§æœ€å¤§çš„ï¼ŒNormal Distributionæ˜¯é¡å¤–å‡è¨­æœ€å°‘çš„

å› æ­¤æˆ‘å€‘æœ‰å…©å€‹åŸå› å»ä½¿ç”¨Normal Distribution

æœ€å¾Œä¾†é€ä¸€å›ç­”å‰›é–‹å§‹çš„å•é¡Œ

class Retangle:
    def __init__(self, width, height):
        self._width = width
        self._height = height

    def get_area(self):
        return self._width * self._height

class Square:
    def __init__(self, width):
        self._retangle = Retangle(width, width)

    def get_area(self):
        return self._retangle.get_area()

class Student:
    def __init__(self, name):
        self.name = name

class Leader:
    def countStudents(self, student_list):
        print("Total number of students is " + len(student_list))

class Teacher:
    def command(self, name_list, leader):
        student_list = [Student(name) for name in name_list]  # `Student` is not a friend
        leader.countStudents(student_list)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    teacher = Teacher()
    leader = Leader()
    name_list = ['A', 'B', 'C', 'D', 'E']
    teacher.command(name_list, leader)

class Student:
    def __init__(self, name):
        self.name = name

class Leader:
    def giveNameList(self, name_list):
        self._student_list = [Student(name) for name in name_list]

    def countStudents(self):
        print("Total number of students is " + len(self._student_list))

class Teacher:
    def command(self, name_list, leader):
        leader.giveNameList(name_list)
        leader.countStudents()

if __name__ == "__main__":
    teacher = Teacher()
    leader = Leader()
    name_list = ['A', 'B', 'C', 'D', 'E']
    teacher.command(name_list, leader)

class Wizard:
    def first(self):
        print("Install first step of wizard at mode")

    def second(self, mode):
        print("Install second step of wizard at mode " + mode)

    def third(self):
        print("Install third step of wizard")

class Install:
    def install(self, wizard, mode):
        wizard.first()
        wizard.second(mode)
        wizard.third()

class Wizard:
    def install(self, mode):
        self._first()
        self._second(mode)
        self._third()

    def _first(self):
        print("Install first step of wizard")

    def _second(self, mode):
        print("Install second step of wizard at mode " + mode)

    def _third(self):
        print("Install third step of wizard")

class Install:
    def install(self, wizard, mode):
        wizard.install(mode)

    def encrypt(self):

class ComplexDocument(Document):

        print("Document opened")
    def close(self):
        print("Document closed")

        print("Document saved")

class DocumentHandler:
    def open(self):
        raise NotImplementedError
    def close(self):
        raise NotImplementedError
    def save(self):
        raise NotImplementedError

class DocumentEncoder:
    def encrypt(self):
        raise NotImplementedError
    def decrypt(self):
        raise NotImplementedError

class SimpleDocument(DocumentHandler):
    def open(self):
        print("Document opened")
    def close(self):
        print("Document closed")
    def save(self):
        print("Document saved")

class ComplexDocument(DocumentHandler, DocumentEncoder):
    def open(self):
        print("Document opened")
    def close(self):
        print("Document closed")
    def save(self):
        print("Document saved")
    def encrypt(self):
        print("Document encrypted")
    def decrypt(self):
        print("Document decrypted")

/* Java */

class Cat {  
    private String name; 

    public Cat(String name) { 
        this.name = name; 
    }
    // method overloading
    public Cat() {
        this("No-Name"); // given "No-Name" as its name
    }

    public String shout() { 
        return "My name is " + name + ". meow~"; 
    }
}

public class Test {
    public static void main(String[] args) { 
        Cat cat = new Cat(); // no-argumant format
        System.out.println(cat.shout());
    }
}
// output:
// My name is No-Name. meow~

### Python3

class Calculation:
    def __init__(self, nums):
        self._nums = nums  # {1}
        for num in self._nums:
            self._checkPositiveInteger(num)

    def _checkPositiveInteger(self, num):  # {2}
        if (not isinstance(num, int)) or (num <= 0):
            raise ValueError("invalid positive integer: " + str(num))

    def _primeFactorize(self, num):  # {3}
        prime_factorize = dict()
        i = 2
        while(num > 1):
            if num % i == 0:
                prime_factorize[i] = prime_factorize.get(i, 0) + 1
                num /= i
            else:
                i += 1
        return prime_factorize

    def findGCF(self):
        prime_factorize = [self._primeFactorize(num) for num in nums]

        common_prime = set(prime_factorize[0].keys())
        for pf in prime_factorize[1:]:
            common_prime &= set(pf.keys())

        gcf = 1
        for prime in common_prime:
            m = min([pf[prime] for pf in prime_factorize])
            gcf = gcf * (prime ** m)

        return gcf

    def findLCM(self):
        gcf = self.findGCF()
        lcm = gcf
        for num in self._nums:
            lcm *= int(num / gcf)
        return lcm

/* Java */

class Cat {
    private String name = "";

    public Cat(String name) {
        this.name = name;
    }
    public Cat() {
        this("No-Name");
    }

    private int shout_num = 3; //{1}
    public int getShoutNum() { return shout_num; } //{2}
    public void setShoutNum(int num) { //{3}
        if (num < 0) throw new java.lang.IllegalArgumentException();
        shout_num = num; 
    }

    public String shout() {
        String result = "";
        for (int i=0; i<shout_num; i++){
            result += "meow~ ";
        }
        return "My name is " + name + ". " + result;
    }
}

public class Test {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        Cat cat = new Cat("May");
        cat.setShoutNum(5); //{4}
        System.out.println(cat.shout());
    }
}
// output:
// My name is May. meow~ meow~ meow~ meow~ meow~

{3} ç‚ºäº†åšåˆ°å°è£ï¼Œå¤–éƒ¨ä¸èƒ½ç›´æ¥å»æ”¹è®Šshout_numï¼Œè€Œæ˜¯ç¶“ç”±setShoutNumçš„å¤–éƒ¨æ–¹æ³•ä¾†ä»¥åˆç†çš„æ–¹æ³•æ”¹è®Šå«è²æ¬¡æ•¸ï¼Œåœ¨é€™å€‹æ–¹æ³•ä¸­ï¼Œæˆ‘å€‘æœƒå…ˆæª¢æŸ¥å†è¨­å®šï¼Œå¦‚æœæ˜¯ç›´æ¥çš„æ”¹è®Šshout_numå°‡æœƒå°‘äº†é€™ä¸€ä»½æª¢æŸ¥ï¼Œé€™å€‹setXXXçš„å½¢å¼åœ¨ç‰©ä»¶å°å‘è£¡é ­è¢«ç¨±ç‚ºSetterã€‚

class Cat:
    def __init__(self, name="No-Name"):
        self._name = name
        self._shout_num = 3

    @property  #{1}
    def shout_num(self):
        return self._shout_num

    @shout_num.setter  #{2}
    def shout_num(self, num):
        if num < 0: 
            raise ValueError()
        self._shout_num = num

    def shout(self):
        result = ""
        for _ in range(self.shout_num):
            result += "meow~ "
        return "My name is " + self._name + ". " + result

def main():
    cat = Cat("May")
    cat.shout_num = 5  #{3}
    print(cat.shout())

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

# output:
# My name is May. meow~ meow~ meow~ meow~ meow~

/* Java */

class Animal {
    protected String name = ""; //{1}

    public Animal(String name) {
        this.name = name;
    }
    public Animal() {
        this("No-Name");
    }

    protected int shout_num = 3;
    public int getShoutNum() {
        return shout_num;
    }
    public void setShoutNum(int num) {
        if (num < 0) throw new java.lang.IllegalArgumentException();
        shout_num = num;
    }
}

class Cat extends Animal{
    public Cat(String name) {
        super(name); //{2}
    }
    public Cat() {
        super();
    }

    public String shout() {
        String result = "";
        for (int i=0; i<shout_num; i++){
            result += "meow~ ";
        }
        return "My name is " + name + ". " + result;
    }
}
class Dog extends Animal{
    public String shout() {
        String result = "";
        for (int i=0; i<shout_num; i++){
            result += "woof~ ";
        }
        return "My name is "+name+". "+result;
    }
}

/* Java */

abstract class Animal { //{1}
    protected String name = "";

    public Animal(String name) {
        this.name = name;
    }
    public Animal() {
        this("No-Name");
    }

    protected int shout_num = 3;
    public int getShoutNum() {
        return shout_num;
    }
    public void setShoutNum(int num) {
        if (num < 0) throw new java.lang.IllegalArgumentException();
        shout_num = num;
    }

    public String shout() { //{2}
        String result = "";
        for (int i=0; i<shout_num; i++){
            result += getShoutSound()+" "; //{3}
        }
        return "My name is " + name + ". " + result;
    }
    abstract protected String getShoutSound(); //{4}
}

class Cat extends Animal{
    protected String getShoutSound() { //{5}
        return "meow~"; 
    }
}
class Dog extends Animal{
    protected String getShoutSound() {
        return "woof~";
    }
}

class Animal:

        self._name = name
        self._shout_num = 3

    @property
    def shout_num(self):

/* Java */

interface IFly { //{1}
    public String flyTo(String place); //{2}
}
class FlyingCat extends Cat implements IFly { //{3}
    public String flyTo(String place) { //{4}
        return shout() + " I'm going to fly to " + place + ".";
    }
}

public class Test {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        FlyingCat cat = new FlyingCat("May");
        System.out.println(cat.flyTo("Taiwan"));
    }
}
// output: 
// My name is May. meow~ meow~ meow~ I'm going to fly to Taiwan.

/* Java */

abstract class Animal { 
    protected String name = "";

    public Animal(String name) {
        this.name = name;
    }
    public Animal() {
        this("No-Name");
    }

    protected int shout_num = 3;
    public int getShoutNum() {
        return shout_num;
    }
    public void setShoutNum(int num) {
        if (num < 0) throw new java.lang.IllegalArgumentException();
        shout_num = num;
    }

    public String shout() { 
        String result = "";
        for (int i=0; i<shout_num; i++){
            result += getShoutSound() + " "; 
        }
        return "My name is " + name + ". " + result;
    }
    abstract protected String getShoutSound(); 
}

class Cat extends Animal{
    protected String getShoutSound() { 
        return "meow~"; 
    }
}
class Dog extends Animal{
    protected String getShoutSound() {
        return "woof~";
    }
}

public class ShoutGame {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        Animal[] arrayAnimal = new Animal[3]; //{1}
        // polymorphism
        arrayAnimal[0] = new Cat("May"); //{2}
        arrayAnimal[1] = new Dog("Linda");
        arrayAnimal[2] = new Cat("Joy");
        for (Animal animal: arrayAnimal) {
            System.out.println(animal.shout()); //{3}
        }
    }
}
// output: 
// My name is May. meow~ meow~ meow~
// My name is Linda. woof~ woof~ woof~
// My name is Joy. meow~ meow~ meow~

### Python3

class Animal: 
    def __init__(self, name="No-Name"):
        self._name = name
        self._shout_num = 3

    @property
    def shout_num(self):
        return self._shout_num

    @shout_num.setter
    def shout_num(self,num):
        self._shout_num = num

    def shout(self):
        result = ""
        for _ in range(self.shout_num):
            result += self._getShoutSound() + " "
        return "My name is " + self._name + ". " + result  

    def _getShoutSound(self):
        raise NotImplementedError

class Cat(Animal):
    def _getShoutSound(self):
        return "meow~"

class Dog(Animal):
    def _getShoutSound(self):
        return "woof~"

def main():
    # Shout Game
    arrayAnimal = [] #{1}
    arrayAnimal.append(Cat("May")) 
    arrayAnimal.append(Dog("Linda"))
    arrayAnimal.append(Cat("Joy"))
    for animal in arrayAnimal:
        if not isinstance(animal, Animal): 
            raise TypeError #not necessary #{2}
        print(animal.shout())

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

# output: 
# My name is May. meow~ meow~ meow~
# My name is Linda. woof~ woof~ woof~
# My name is Joy. meow~ meow~ meow~

def main():
    str_numA = input("Positive Integer A: ")
    str_numB = input("Positive Integer B: ")

    numA = int(str_numA)
    numB = int(str_numB)

    prime_factorize_A = dict()
    i = 2
    while(numA > 1):
        if numA % i == 0:
            prime_factorize_A[i] = prime_factorize_A.get(i,0) + 1
            numA /= i
        else:
            i += 1

    prime_factorize_B = dict()
    i = 2
    while(numB > 1):
        if numB % i == 0:
            prime_factorize_B[i] = prime_factorize_B.get(i,0) + 1
            numB /= i
        else:
            i += 1    

    common_prime = set(prime_factorize_A.keys()) & set(prime_factorize_B.keys())

    gcf = 1
    for prime in list(common_prime):
        m = min(prime_factorize_A[prime], prime_factorize_B[prime])
        gcf = gcf * (prime ** m)

    print("Greatest Common Factor: "+ str(gcf))

def checkPositiveInteger(num):
    if (not isinstance(num, int)) or (num <= 0):
        raise ValueError("invalid positive integer: " + str(num))

def primeFactorize(num):
    checkPositiveInteger(num)

    prime_factorize = dict()
    i = 2
    while(num > 1):
        if num % i == 0:
            prime_factorize[i] = prime_factorize.get(i, 0) + 1
            num /= i
        else:
            i += 1
    return prime_factorize

def main():
    str_numA = input("Positive Integer A: ")
    str_numB = input("Positive Integer B: ")

    numA = int(str_numA)
    numB = int(str_numB)

    prime_factorize_A = primeFactorize(numA)
    prime_factorize_B = primeFactorize(numB)

    common_prime = set(prime_factorize_A.keys()) & set(prime_factorize_B.keys())

    gcf = 1
    for prime in list(common_prime):
        m = min(prime_factorize_A[prime], prime_factorize_B[prime])
        gcf = gcf * (prime ** m)

    print("Greatest Common Factor: "+ str(gcf))

æ¥ä¸‹ä¾†ä¾†æª¢æŸ¥ä¸€ä¸‹ã€Œç©©å¥åº¦ã€å’Œã€Œå¯æ“´å±•ã€ï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯ç¨‹å¼æ˜¯å¦ç¬¦åˆï¼šä½è€¦åˆã€é«˜å…§èšï¼Œå…¶å¯¦ä¸Šé¢çš„ç¨‹å¼ç¢¼æœ‰ä¸€å€‹å¤§å•é¡Œï¼Œå®¢æˆ¶ç«¯é‚è¼¯å’Œæ¥­å‹™é‚è¼¯æ··ç‚ºä¸€è«‡ï¼Œå®¢æˆ¶ç«¯é‚è¼¯å°±æ˜¯å¯¦ç¾åŠŸèƒ½çš„éƒ¨åˆ†ï¼Œè€Œæ¥­å‹™é‚è¼¯å°±æ˜¯å¯¦ä½œçš„ç´°ç¯€ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ä¸Šé¢çš„ç¨‹å¼ç¢¼æŠŠæ‰€æœ‰çš„å¯¦ä½œçš„ç´°ç¯€å…¨éƒ¨æ”¤åœ¨å®¢æˆ¶ç«¯ï¼Œé€™æ˜¯ç›¸ç•¶ä¸å¥½çš„ï¼Œé€™æœƒé€ æˆä¸æ˜“æ›´æ”¹ï¼Œå› æ­¤æˆ‘å€‘å°‡ç¨‹å¼ä½œå–®å…ƒçš„æ‹†åˆ†ï¼Œè®“æ¥­å‹™é‚è¼¯å’Œå®¢æˆ¶ç«¯é‚è¼¯ç›¸åˆ†é›¢ï¼Œè®“ä¸ç›´æ¥å¯¦ç¾å®¢æˆ¶ç«¯çš„ç¨‹å¼ç¢¼å¯ä»¥éš±è—èµ·ä¾†ï¼Œæ¸›å°‘å®¢æˆ¶ç«¯å’Œæ¥­å‹™é‚è¼¯çš„è€¦åˆã€‚ç„¶å¾Œé †é“åŠ å…¥æ±‚å–æœ€å°å…¬å€æ•¸çš„åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚

def checkPositiveInteger(num):
    # ... same as above, omit ...

def primeFactorize(num):
    # ... same as above, omit ...

def findGCF(nums):
    prime_factorize = [primeFactorize(num) for num in nums]

    common_prime = set(prime_factorize[0].keys())
    for pf in prime_factorize[1:]:
        common_prime &= set(pf.keys())

    gcf = 1
    for prime in common_prime:
        m = min([pf[prime] for pf in prime_factorize])
        gcf = gcf * (prime ** m)

    return gcf

def findLCM(nums):
    gcf = findGCF(nums)
    lcm = gcf
    for num in nums:
        lcm *= int(num / gcf)
    return lcm

def main():
    str_numA = input("Positive Integer A: ")
    str_numB = input("Positive Integer B: ")

    numA = int(str_numA)
    numB = int(str_numB)

    nums = [numA,numB]    
    gcf = findGCF(nums)
    lcm = findLCM(nums)

    print("Greatest Common Factor: " + str(gcf))
    print("Lowest Common Multiple: " + str(lcm))

class Calculation:
    def __init__(self, nums):
        self._nums = nums
        for num in self._nums:
            self._checkPositiveInteger(num)

    def _checkPositiveInteger(self, num):
        if (not isinstance(num, int)) or (num <= 0):
              raise ValueError("invalid positive integer: " + str(num))

    def _primeFactorize(self, num):
        prime_factorize = dict()
        i = 2
        while(num > 1):
            if num % i == 0:
                prime_factorize[i] = prime_factorize.get(i, 0) + 1
                num /= i
            else:
                i += 1
        return prime_factorize

    def findGCF(self):
        prime_factorize = [self._primeFactorize(num) for num in nums]

        common_prime = set(prime_factorize[0].keys())
        for pf in prime_factorize[1:]:
            common_prime &= set(pf.keys())

        gcf = 1
        for prime in common_prime:
            m = min([pf[prime] for pf in prime_factorize])
            gcf = gcf * (prime ** m)

        return gcf

    def findLCM(self):
        gcf = self.findGCF()
        lcm = gcf
        for num in self._nums:
            lcm *= int(num / gcf)
        return lcm

def main():
    str_numA = input("Positive Integer A: ")
    str_numB = input("Positive Integer B: ")

    numA = int(str_numA)
    numB = int(str_numB)

    nums = [numA,numB]
    calc = Calculation(nums)
    gcf = calc.findGCF()
    lcm = calc.findLCM()

    print("Greatest Common Factor: " + str(gcf))
    print("Lowest Common Multiple: " + str(lcm))

é€™ç¨®å°‡èˆŠæœ‰è³‡è¨Šä¿ç•™çš„Neurel Networkçµ±ç¨±ç‚ºRecurrent Neural Networks (RNN)ï¼Œé€™ç¨®ä¸æ–·å›é¥‹çš„ç¶²è·¯å¯ä»¥æ”¤é–‹ä¾†è™•ç†ï¼Œå¦‚ä¸Šåœ–ï¼Œå¦‚æœæˆ‘æœ‰5ç­†æ•¸æ“šï¼Œæ‹¿è¨“ç·´ä¸€å€‹RNN 5å€‹å›åˆä¸¦åšäº†5æ¬¡æ›´æ–°ï¼Œå…¶å¯¦å°±ç­‰æ•ˆæ–¼æ”¤é–‹ä¾†ä¸€æ¬¡è™•ç†5ç­†æ•¸æ“šä¸¦åš1æ¬¡æ›´æ–°ï¼Œé€™æ¨£çš„æ‰‹æ³•å«åšUnrollingï¼Œæˆ‘å€‘å¯¦ä½œä¸Šæœƒä½¿ç”¨Unrollingçš„æ‰‹æ³•ä¾†å¢åŠ è¨ˆç®—æ•ˆç‡ã€‚

æ¥ä¸‹ä¾†ä¾†çœ‹RNNå…§éƒ¨æ€éº¼å¯¦ç¾çš„ï¼Œä¸Šåœ–æ˜¯æœ€ç°¡å–®çš„RNNå½¢å¼ï¼Œæˆ‘å€‘å°‡ä¸Šä¸€å›ç”¢ç”Ÿçš„Outputå’Œé€™ä¸€å›çš„Inputä¸€èµ·è©•ä¼°å‡ºé€™ä¸€å›çš„Outputï¼Œè©³ç´°å¼å­å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

$$ o_{new}=tanh(i \times W_i + o \times W_o + B) $$

å¦‚æ­¤ä¸€ä¾†RNNå°±å…·æœ‰æ™‚åºæ€§äº†ï¼ŒèˆŠçš„æ­·å²è³‡æ–™å°‡å¯ä»¥è¢«ã€Œè¨˜æ†¶ã€èµ·ä¾†ï¼Œä½ å¯ä»¥æŠŠRNNçš„ã€Œè¨˜æ†¶ã€çœ‹æˆæ˜¯ã€ŒçŸ­æœŸè¨˜æ†¶ã€ï¼Œå› ç‚ºå®ƒåªæœƒè¨˜å¾—ä¸Šä¸€å›çš„Outputè€Œå·²ã€‚

ä½†é€™ç¨®å½¢å¼çš„RNNåœ¨å¯¦ä½œä¸Šæœƒé‡åˆ°å¾ˆå¤§çš„å•é¡Œï¼Œé‚„è¨˜å¾—ç¬¬äºŒç« ç•¶ä¸­ï¼Œæˆ‘å€‘æœ‰è¬›éåƒæ˜¯tanhé€™é¡æœ‰é£½å’Œå€çš„å‡½æ•¸ï¼Œæœƒé€ æˆæ¢¯åº¦æ¶ˆå¤±çš„å•é¡Œï¼Œè€Œæˆ‘å€‘å¦‚æœä½¿ç”¨Unrollingçš„è§€é»ä¾†çœ‹RNNï¼Œå°‡æœƒç™¼ç¾é€™æ˜¯ä¸€å€‹è¶…ç´šæ·±çš„ç¶²è·¯ï¼ŒBackpapagationå¿…é ˆä¸€è·¯é€šåˆ°t0çš„RNNï¼Œæƒ³ç•¶ç„¶çˆ¾ï¼Œæœ‰äº›æ¢¯åº¦å°‡æœƒæ¶ˆå¤±ï¼Œéƒ¨åˆ†æ¬Šé‡å°±æ›´æ–°ä¸åˆ°äº†ï¼Œé‚£æœ‰ä¸€äº›è°æ˜çš„è®€è€…ä¸€å®šæœƒæƒ³åˆ°ï¼Œé‚£å°±ä½¿ç”¨Reluå°±å¥½å•¦ï¼ä¸éå…¶å¯¦é‚„æœ‰ä¸€å€‹é‡è¦çš„å› ç´ é€ æˆæ¢¯åº¦æ¶ˆå¤±ï¼ŒåŒæ™‚ä¹Ÿé€ æˆæ¢¯åº¦çˆ†ç‚¸ã€‚

æ³¨æ„å–”ï¼é›–ç„¶æˆ‘å€‘ä½¿ç”¨Unrollingçš„è§€é»ï¼ŒæŠŠç¶²è·¯çœ‹æˆæ˜¯ä¸€å€‹Deepç¶²è·¯çš„é€£æ¥ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯å’Œä¹‹å‰DNNä¸åŒä¹‹è™•ï¼Œé€™äº›RNNå½¼æ­¤é–“æ˜¯å…±äº«åŒä¸€çµ„æ¬Šé‡çš„ï¼Œé€™æœƒé€ æˆæ¢¯åº¦æ¶ˆå¤±å’Œæ¢¯åº¦çˆ†ç‚¸å…©å€‹å•é¡Œï¼Œåœ¨RNNçš„çµæ§‹è£¡é ­ï¼Œä¸€å€‹æ¬Šé‡æœƒéš¨è‘—æ™‚é–“ä¸æ–·çš„åŠ å¼·å½±éŸ¿ä¸€å€‹å–®ä¸€ç‰¹å¾µï¼Œå› ç‚ºä¸åŒæ™‚é–“ä¹‹ä¸‹çš„RNN Cellå…±ç”¨åŒä¸€å€‹æ¬Šé‡ï¼Œé€™éº¼ä¸€ä¾†è‹¥æ˜¯æ¬Šé‡å¤§æ–¼1ï¼Œå½±éŸ¿å°‡æœƒéš¨æ™‚é–“æ”¾å¤§åˆ°æ¢¯åº¦çˆ†ç‚¸ï¼Œè‹¥æ˜¯æ¬Šé‡å°æ–¼1ï¼Œå½±éŸ¿å°‡æœƒéš¨æ™‚é–“ç¸®å°åˆ°æ¢¯åº¦æ¶ˆå¤±ï¼Œå°±åƒæ˜¯è´è¶æ•ˆæ‡‰ä¸€èˆ¬ï¼Œå¾®å°çš„å·®ç•°å› ç‚ºå›é¥‹çš„æ©Ÿåˆ¶ï¼Œè€Œä¸åˆç†çš„æ”¾å¤§æˆ–æ˜¯æ¶ˆå¤±ï¼Œå› æ­¤RNNçš„Error Surfaceå°‡æœƒå´å¶‡ä¸å¹³ï¼Œé€™æœƒé€ æˆæˆ‘å€‘ç„¡æ³•ç©©å®šçš„æ‰¾åˆ°æœ€ä½³è§£ï¼Œé›£ä»¥æ”¶æ–‚ã€‚é€™æ‰æ˜¯RNNé›£ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨çš„é‡è¦åŸå› ï¼ŒæŠŠActivation Functionæ›æˆReluä¸æœƒè§£æ±ºå•é¡Œï¼Œæ–‡ç»ä¸Šåè€Œå‘Šè¨´æˆ‘å€‘æœƒè®Šæ›´å·®ã€‚

è§£æ±ºæ¢¯åº¦çˆ†ç‚¸æœ‰ä¸€å€‹è½èµ·ä¾†å¾ˆå»¢ä½†å»£ç‚ºäººå€‘ä½¿ç”¨çš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå«åšGradient Clippingï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯åªè¦åœ¨æ›´æ–°éç¨‹æ¢¯åº¦è¶…éä¸€å€‹å€¼ï¼Œæˆ‘å°±åˆ‡æ‰è®“æ¢¯åº¦ç¶­æŒåœ¨é€™å€‹ä¸Šé™ï¼Œé€™æ¨£å°±ä¸æœƒçˆ†ç‚¸å•¦ï¼Œå¾…æœƒæœƒè¬›åˆ°çš„LSTMåªèƒ½å¤ è§£æ±ºæ¢¯åº¦æ¶ˆå¤±å•é¡Œï¼Œä½†ä¸èƒ½è§£æ±ºæ¢¯åº¦çˆ†ç‚¸å•é¡Œï¼Œå› æ­¤æˆ‘å€‘é‚„æ˜¯éœ€è¦Gradient Clippingæ–¹æ³•çš„å¹«å¿™ã€‚

åœ¨Tensorflowæ€éº¼åšåˆ°Gradient Clippingå‘¢ï¼Ÿä½œæ³•æ˜¯é€™æ¨£çš„ï¼Œä»¥å¾€æˆ‘å€‘ä½¿ç”¨optimizer.minimize(loss)ä¾†é€²è¡Œæ›´æ–°ï¼Œäº‹å¯¦ä¸Šæˆ‘å€‘å¯ä»¥æŠŠé€™ä¸€æ­¥é©Ÿæ‹†æˆå…©éƒ¨åˆ†ï¼Œç¬¬ä¸€éƒ¨åˆ†è¨ˆç®—æ‰€æœ‰åƒæ•¸çš„æ¢¯åº¦ï¼Œç¬¬äºŒéƒ¨åˆ†ä½¿ç”¨é€™äº›æ¢¯åº¦é€²è¡Œæ›´æ–°ã€‚å› æ­¤æˆ‘å€‘å¯ä»¥å¾ä¸­ä½œæ¢—ï¼ŒæŠŠgradientså·å¤©æ›æ—¥ä¸€ç•ªï¼Œä¸€é–‹å§‹ä½¿ç”¨optimizer.compute_gradients(loss)ä¾†è¨ˆç®—å‡ºå€‹åˆ¥çš„æ¢¯åº¦ï¼Œç„¶å¾Œä½¿ç”¨tf.clip_by_global_norm(gradients, clip_norm)ä¾†åˆ‡æ¢¯åº¦ï¼Œæœ€å¾Œå†ä½¿ç”¨optimizer.apply_gradientsæŠŠæ–°çš„æ¢¯åº¦é¤µå…¥é€²è¡Œæ›´æ–°ã€‚

Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM)

LSTMæ˜¯ç¾ä»ŠRNNçš„ä¸»æµï¼Œå®ƒå¯ä»¥è§£æ±ºæ¢¯åº¦æ¶ˆå¤±çš„å•é¡Œï¼Œæˆ‘å€‘å…ˆä¾†çœ‹çœ‹çµæ§‹ï¼Œå…ˆé å‘Šä¸€ä¸‹ï¼ŒLSTMæ˜¯è¿„ä»Šç‚ºæ­¢é€™ç³»åˆ—èª²ç¨‹ç•¶ä¸­çœ‹éæœ€è¤‡é›œçš„Neurel Networkã€‚

æœ€ä¸€é–‹å§‹å’ŒRNNä¸€æ¨£ï¼ŒInputæœƒå’Œä¸Šä¸€å›çš„Outputä¸€èµ·è©•ä¼°ä¸€å€‹ã€ŒçŸ­æœŸè¨˜æ†¶ã€ï¼Œ

$$ f_m = tanh (i \times W_{mi} + o \times W_{mo} + B_m) $$

ä½†æ¥ä¸‹ä¾†ä¸åŒæ–¼RNNç›´æ¥è¼¸å‡ºï¼ŒLSTMåšäº†ä¸€å€‹é¡ä¼¼æ–¼è½‰æ›æˆã€Œé•·æœŸè¨˜æ†¶ã€çš„æ©Ÿåˆ¶ï¼Œã€Œé•·æœŸè¨˜æ†¶ã€åœ¨é€™è£¡ç¨±ç‚ºStateï¼ŒStateçš„ç‹€æ…‹ç”±ä¸‰é“é–€æ‰€æ§åˆ¶ï¼ŒInput Gateè² è²¬æ§ç®¡å“ªäº›ã€ŒçŸ­æœŸè¨˜æ†¶ã€å¯ä»¥é€²åˆ°ã€Œé•·æœŸè¨˜æ†¶ã€ï¼ŒForget Gateè² è²¬èª¿é…å“ªä¸€äº›ã€Œé•·æœŸè¨˜æ†¶ã€éœ€è¦è¢«éºå¿˜ï¼ŒOutput Gateå‰‡è² è²¬å»æ±ºå®šéœ€è¦å¾ã€Œé•·æœŸè¨˜æ†¶ã€ä¸­è¼¸å‡ºæ€æ¨£çš„å…§å®¹ï¼Œå…ˆä¸è¦ç®¡é€™äº›Gateæ€éº¼ä¾†ï¼Œæˆ‘å€‘å¯ä»¥æŠŠé€™æ¨£çš„è¨˜æ†¶æ©Ÿåˆ¶å¯«æˆä»¥ä¸‹çš„å¼å­ï¼Œå‡è¨­Stateç‚º\(f_{state}\)ã€Input Gateç‚º\(G_i\)ã€Forget Gateç‚º\(G_f\)å’ŒOutput Gateç‚º\(G_o\)ã€‚

$$ f_{state,new} = G_i \times f_m + G_f \times f_{state} $$

å¦‚æœæˆ‘å€‘è¦ä½¿å¾—ä¸Šé¢ä¸­Gatesçš„éƒ¨åˆ†å…·æœ‰é–‹é—œçš„åŠŸèƒ½çš„è©±ï¼Œæˆ‘å€‘æœƒå¸Œæœ›Gateså¯ä»¥æ˜¯0åˆ°1çš„å€¼ï¼Œ0ä»£è¡¨å…¨é—œï¼Œ1ä»£è¡¨å…¨é–‹ï¼Œsigmoidæ­£å¯ä»¥å¹«æˆ‘å€‘åšåˆ°é€™ä»¶äº‹ï¼Œé‚£å“ªäº›å› ç´ æœƒæ±ºå®šGatesçš„é—œé–‰èˆ‡å¦å‘¢ï¼Ÿä¸å¦¨è€ƒæ…®æ‰€æœ‰å¯èƒ½çš„å› ç´ ï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯æ‰€æœ‰è¼¸å…¥é€™å€‹Cellçš„è³‡è¨Šéƒ½è€ƒæ…®é€²å»ï¼Œä½†ä¸Šä¸€å›çš„Stateå¿…é ˆè¢«å‰”é™¤æ–¼å¤–ï¼Œå› ç‚ºä¸Šä¸€å›çš„Stateä¾†æ±ºå®šä¸‹ä¸€å€‹Stateçš„æ“ä½œæ˜¯ä¸åˆç†çš„ï¼Œå› æ­¤æˆ‘å€‘å°±å¯ä»¥å¯«ä¸‹æ‰€æœ‰Gatesçš„è¡¨ç¤ºå¼äº†ã€‚

$$ G_i = Sigmoid (i \times W_{ii} + o \times W_{io} + B_i) $$

LETTER_SIZE = len(string.ascii_lowercase) + 1  # [a-z] + ' '
FIRST_LETTER_ASCII = ord(string.ascii_lowercase[0])

def maybe_download(url, filename, expected_bytes):
    """Download a file if not present, and make sure it's the right size."""
    if not os.path.exists(filename):
        filename, _ = urlretrieve(url, filename)
    statinfo = os.stat(filename)
    if statinfo.st_size == expected_bytes:
        print('Found and verified %s' % filename)
    else:
        print(statinfo.st_size)
        raise Exception('Failed to verify ' + filename + '. Can you get to it with a browser?')
    return filename


def read_data(filename):
    with zipfile.ZipFile(filename) as f:
        name = f.namelist()[0]
        data = tf.compat.as_str(f.read(name))
    return data


def char2id(char):
    if char in string.ascii_lowercase:
        return ord(char) - FIRST_LETTER_ASCII + 1
    elif char == ' ':
        return 0
    else:
        print('Unexpected character: %s' % char)
        return 0


def id2char(dictid):
    if dictid > 0:
        return chr(dictid + FIRST_LETTER_ASCII - 1)
    else:
        return ' '


print('Downloading text8.zip')
filename = maybe_download('http://mattmahoney.net/dc/text8.zip', './text8.zip', 31344016)

print('=====')
text = read_data(filename)
print('Data size %d letters' % len(text))

print('=====')
valid_size = 1000
valid_text = text[:valid_size]
train_text = text[valid_size:]
train_size = len(train_text)
print('Train Dataset: size:', train_size, 'letters,\n  first 64:', train_text[:64])
print('Validation Dataset: size:', valid_size, 'letters,\n  first 64:', valid_text[:64])

def characters(probabilities):
    """Turn a 1-hot encoding or a probability distribution over the possible
    characters back into its (most likely) character representation."""
    return [id2char(c) for c in np.argmax(probabilities, 1)]


def batches2string(batches):
    """Convert a sequence of batches back into their (most likely) string
    representation."""
    s = [''] * batches[0].shape[0]
    for b in batches:
        s = [''.join(x) for x in zip(s, characters(b))]
    return s


def rnn_batch_generator(text, batch_size, num_unrollings):
    text_size = len(text)

    ### initialization
    segment = text_size // batch_size
    cursors = [offset * segment for offset in range(batch_size)]

    batches = []
    batch_initial = np.zeros(shape=(batch_size, LETTER_SIZE), dtype=np.float)
    for i in range(batch_size):
        cursor = cursors[i]
        id_ = char2id(text[cursor])
        batch_initial[i][id_] = 1.0

        # move cursor
        cursors[i] = (cursors[i] + 1) % text_size

    batches.append(batch_initial)

    ### generate loop
    while True:
        batches = [batches[-1], ]
        for _ in range(num_unrollings):
            batch = np.zeros(shape=(batch_size, LETTER_SIZE), dtype=np.float)
            for i in range(batch_size):
                cursor = cursors[i]
                id_ = char2id(text[cursor])
                batch[i][id_] = 1.0

                # move cursor
                cursors[i] = (cursors[i] + 1) % text_size
            batches.append(batch)

        yield batches  # [last batch of previous batches] + [unrollings]


# demonstrate generator
batch_size = 64
num_unrollings = 10

train_batches = rnn_batch_generator(train_text, batch_size, num_unrollings)
valid_batches = rnn_batch_generator(valid_text, 1, 1)

print('*** train_batches:')
print(batches2string(next(train_batches)))
print(batches2string(next(train_batches)))
print('*** valid_batches:')
print(batches2string(next(valid_batches)))
print(batches2string(next(valid_batches)))

def sample_distribution(distribution):
    """Sample one element from a distribution assumed to be an array of normalized
    probabilities.
    """
    r = random.uniform(0, 1)
    s = 0
    for i in range(len(distribution)):
        s += distribution[i]
        if s >= r:
            return i
    return len(distribution) - 1


def sample(prediction):
    """Turn a (column) prediction into 1-hot encoded samples."""
    p = np.zeros(shape=[1, LETTER_SIZE], dtype=np.float)
    p[0, sample_distribution(prediction[0])] = 1.0
    return p


def logprob(predictions, labels):
    """Log-probability of the true labels in a predicted batch."""
    predictions[predictions < 1e-10] = 1e-10
    return np.sum(np.multiply(labels, -np.log(predictions))) / labels.shape[0]

class LSTM:

    def __init__(self, n_unrollings, n_memory, n_train_batch, learning_rate=1.0):
        self.n_unrollings = n_unrollings
        self.n_memory = n_memory

        self.weights = None
        self.biases = None
        self.saved = None

        self.graph = tf.Graph()  # initialize new grap
        self.build(learning_rate, n_train_batch)  # building graph
        self.sess = tf.Session(graph=self.graph)  # create session by the graph

    def build(self, learning_rate, n_train_batch):
        with self.graph.as_default():
            ### Input
            self.train_data = list()
            for _ in range(self.n_unrollings + 1):
                self.train_data.append(
                    tf.placeholder(tf.float32, shape=[n_train_batch, LETTER_SIZE]))
            self.train_inputs = self.train_data[:self.n_unrollings]
            self.train_labels = self.train_data[1:]  # labels are inputs shifted by one time step.


            ### Optimalization
            # build neurel network structure and get their loss
            self.y_, self.loss = self.structure(
                inputs=self.train_inputs,
                labels=self.train_labels,
                n_batch=n_train_batch,
            )

            # define training operation

            self.optimizer = tf.train.AdagradOptimizer(learning_rate=learning_rate)

            # gradient clipping

            # output gradients one by one
            gradients, v = zip(*self.optimizer.compute_gradients(self.loss))
            gradients, _ = tf.clip_by_global_norm(gradients, 1.25)  # clip gradient
            # apply clipped gradients
            self.train_op = self.optimizer.apply_gradients(zip(gradients, v))

            ### Sampling and validation eval: batch 1, no unrolling.
            self.sample_input = tf.placeholder(tf.float32, shape=[1, LETTER_SIZE])

            saved_sample_output = tf.Variable(tf.zeros([1, self.n_memory]))
            saved_sample_state = tf.Variable(tf.zeros([1, self.n_memory]))
            self.reset_sample_state = tf.group(     # reset sample state operator
                saved_sample_output.assign(tf.zeros([1, self.n_memory])),
                saved_sample_state.assign(tf.zeros([1, self.n_memory])))

            sample_output, sample_state = self.lstm_cell(
                self.sample_input, saved_sample_output, saved_sample_state)
            with tf.control_dependencies([saved_sample_output.assign(sample_output),
                                          saved_sample_state.assign(sample_state)]):
                # use tf.control_dependencies to make sure 'saving' before 'prediction'

                self.sample_prediction = tf.nn.softmax(
                    tf.nn.xw_plus_b(sample_output,
                                    self.weights['classifier'],
                                    self.biases['classifier']))

            ### Initialization
            self.init_op = tf.global_variables_initializer()

    def lstm_cell(self, i, o, state):
        """"Create a LSTM cell. See e.g.: http://arxiv.org/pdf/1402.1128v1.pdf
        Note that in this formulation, we omit the various connections between the
        previous state and the gates."""
        ## Build Input Gate
        ix = self.weights['input_gate_i']
        im = self.weights['input_gate_o']
        ib = self.biases['input_gate']
        input_gate = tf.sigmoid(tf.matmul(i, ix) + tf.matmul(o, im) + ib)
        ## Build Forget Gate
        fx = self.weights['forget_gate_i']
        fm = self.weights['forget_gate_o']
        fb = self.biases['forget_gate']
        forget_gate = tf.sigmoid(tf.matmul(i, fx) + tf.matmul(o, fm) + fb)
        ## Memory
        cx = self.weights['memory_i']
        cm = self.weights['memory_o']
        cb = self.biases['memory']
        update = tf.matmul(i, cx) + tf.matmul(o, cm) + cb
        ## Update State
        state = forget_gate * state + input_gate * tf.tanh(update)
        ## Build Output Gate
        ox = self.weights['output_gate_i']
        om = self.weights['output_gate_o']
        ob = self.biases['output_gate']
        output_gate = tf.sigmoid(tf.matmul(i, ox) + tf.matmul(o, om) + ob)
        ## Ouput
        output = output_gate * tf.tanh(state)

        return output, state

    def structure(self, inputs, labels, n_batch):
        ### Variable
        if (not self.weights) or (not self.biases) or (not self.saved):
            self.weights = {
              'input_gate_i': tf.Variable(tf.truncated_normal(
                  [LETTER_SIZE, self.n_memory], -0.1, 0.1)),
              'input_gate_o': tf.Variable(tf.truncated_normal(
                  [self.n_memory, self.n_memory], -0.1, 0.1)),
              'forget_gate_i': tf.Variable(tf.truncated_normal(
                  [LETTER_SIZE, self.n_memory], -0.1, 0.1)),
              'forget_gate_o': tf.Variable(tf.truncated_normal(
                  [self.n_memory, self.n_memory], -0.1, 0.1)),
              'output_gate_i': tf.Variable(tf.truncated_normal(
                  [LETTER_SIZE, self.n_memory], -0.1, 0.1)),
              'output_gate_o': tf.Variable(tf.truncated_normal(
                  [self.n_memory, self.n_memory], -0.1, 0.1)),
              'memory_i': tf.Variable(tf.truncated_normal(
                  [LETTER_SIZE, self.n_memory], -0.1, 0.1)),
              'memory_o': tf.Variable(tf.truncated_normal(
                  [self.n_memory, self.n_memory], -0.1, 0.1)),
              'classifier': tf.Variable(tf.truncated_normal(
                  [self.n_memory, LETTER_SIZE], -0.1, 0.1)),

            }
            self.biases = {
              'input_gate': tf.Variable(tf.zeros([1, self.n_memory])),
              'forget_gate': tf.Variable(tf.zeros([1, self.n_memory])),
              'output_gate': tf.Variable(tf.zeros([1, self.n_memory])),
              'memory': tf.Variable(tf.zeros([1, self.n_memory])),
              'classifier': tf.Variable(tf.zeros([LETTER_SIZE])),
            }

        # Variables saving state across unrollings.
        saved_output = tf.Variable(tf.zeros([n_batch, self.n_memory]), trainable=False)
        saved_state = tf.Variable(tf.zeros([n_batch, self.n_memory]), trainable=False)

        ### Structure
        # Unrolled LSTM loop.
        outputs = list()
        output = saved_output
        state = saved_state
        for input_ in inputs:
            output, state = self.lstm_cell(input_, output, state)
            outputs.append(output)

        # State saving across unrollings.
        with tf.control_dependencies([saved_output.assign(output),
                                      saved_state.assign(state)]):
            # use tf.control_dependencies to make sure 'saving' before 'calculating loss'

            # Classifier
            logits = tf.nn.xw_plus_b(tf.concat(outputs, 0),
                                     self.weights['classifier'],
                                     self.biases['classifier'])
            y_ = tf.nn.softmax(logits)
            loss = tf.reduce_mean(
                    tf.nn.softmax_cross_entropy_with_logits(
                        labels=tf.concat(labels, 0), logits=logits))

        return y_, loss

    def initialize(self):
        self.weights = None
        self.biases = None
        self.sess.run(self.init_op)

    def online_fit(self, X):
        feed_dict = dict()
        for i in range(self.n_unrollings + 1):
            feed_dict[self.train_data[i]] = X[i]

        _, loss = self.sess.run([self.train_op, self.loss], feed_dict=feed_dict)
        return loss

    def perplexity(self, X):
        sum_logprob = 0
        sample_size = len(X)-1
        batch_size = X[0].shape[0]

        for i in range(batch_size):
            self.sess.run(self.reset_sample_state)
            for j in range(sample_size):
                sample_input = np.reshape(X[j][i], newshape=(1, -1))
                sample_label = np.reshape(X[j+1][i], newshape=(1, -1))
                predictions = self.sess.run(self.sample_prediction,
                                            feed_dict={self.sample_input: sample_input})
                sum_logprob += logprob(predictions, sample_label)
        perplexity = float(np.exp(sum_logprob / batch_size / sample_size))
        return perplexity

    def generate(self, c, len_generate):
        feed = np.array([[1 if id2char(i) == c else 0 for i in range(LETTER_SIZE)]])
        sentence = characters(feed)[0]
        self.sess.run(self.reset_sample_state)
        for _ in range(len_generate):
            prediction = self.sess.run(self.sample_prediction, feed_dict={self.sample_input: feed})
            feed = sample(prediction)
            sentence += characters(feed)[0]
        return sentence

# build training batch generator
batch_generator = rnn_batch_generator(
    text=train_text,
    batch_size=batch_size,
    num_unrollings=num_unrollings,
)

# build validation data
valid_batches = rnn_batch_generator(
    text=valid_text, 
    batch_size=1, 
    num_unrollings=1,
)

valid_data = [np.array(next(valid_batches)) for _ in range(valid_size)]

# build LSTM model
model_LSTM = LSTM(
    n_unrollings=num_unrollings,
    n_memory=128,
    n_train_batch=batch_size,
    learning_rate=0.9
)

# initial model
model_LSTM.initialize()

# online training
epochs = 30
num_batchs_in_epoch = 5000
valid_freq = 5

for epoch in range(epochs):
    start_time = time.time()
    avg_loss = 0
    for _ in range(num_batchs_in_epoch):
        batch = next(batch_generator)
        loss = model_LSTM.online_fit(X=batch)
        avg_loss += loss

    avg_loss = avg_loss / num_batchs_in_epoch

    train_perplexity = model_LSTM.perplexity(batch)
    print('Epoch %d/%d: %ds loss = %6.4f, perplexity = %6.4f'
           % ( epoch+1, epochs, time.time()-start_time, avg_loss, train_perplexity))

    if (epoch+1) % valid_freq == 0:
        print('')
        print('=============== Validation ===============')
        print('validation perplexity = %6.4f' % (model_LSTM.perplexity(valid_data)))
        print('Generate From \'a\':  ', model_LSTM.generate(c='a', len_generate=50))
        print('Generate From \'h\':  ', model_LSTM.generate(c='h', len_generate=50))
        print('Generate From \'m\':  ', model_LSTM.generate(c='m', len_generate=50))
        print('==========================================')
        print('')

å¦å¤–ï¼Œç¶“ç ”ç©¶æŒ‡å‡ºé€™å€‹Embeddingç©ºé–“çš„æ•ˆæœä¸åªæ˜¯å¯ä»¥ç®—å‡ºè©å½™é–“çš„ç›¸ä¼¼æ€§ï¼Œé‚„å¯ä»¥é¡¯ç¤ºè©å½™é–“çš„æ¯”è¼ƒé—œä¿‚ï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚ï¼šåŒ—äº¬ä¹‹æ–¼ä¸­åœ‹ï¼Œç­‰åŒæ–¼å°åŒ—ä¹‹æ–¼å°ç£ï¼Œé€™æ¨£çš„æ¯”è¼ƒé—œä¿‚ä¹Ÿé¡¯ç¤ºåœ¨é€™å€‹Embeddingç©ºé–“è£¡é ­ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥åœ¨é€™ç©ºé–“è£¡æœƒæœ‰ä»¥ä¸‹çš„å‘é‡é—œä¿‚å¼ï¼š\(V_{åŒ—äº¬} - V_{ä¸­åœ‹}+V_{å°ç£}=V_{å°åŒ—}\)ï¼Œæ˜¯ä¸æ˜¯å¾ˆç¥å¥‡å•Šï¼

Word2Vecçš„å…©ç¨®å¸¸ç”¨æ–¹æ³•ï¼šSkip-Gramå’ŒCBOW

å‰›å‰›ä¸€ç›´åœ¨è¬›çš„æ˜¯ä¸­é–“çš„çµæ§‹æ‡‰è©²æ€éº¼å»ºç«‹ï¼Œç¾åœ¨ä¾†çœ‹çœ‹æˆ‘å€‘å¯ä»¥è¼¸å…¥å’Œè¼¸å‡ºå“ªäº›è©å½™ä¾†å»ºç«‹èµ·ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡çš„é—œä¿‚ï¼Œæœ‰å…©ç¨®å¸¸ç”¨çš„é¡åˆ¥ï¼šSkip-Gramå’ŒCBOWã€‚

Skip-Gramå¦‚ä¸Šåœ–æ‰€ç¤ºï¼Œç•¶æˆ‘è¼¸å…¥ä¸€å€‹\(word(t)\)æ™‚ï¼Œæˆ‘å¸Œæœ›å®ƒèƒ½è¼¸å‡ºå®ƒçš„å‰æ–‡å’Œå¾Œæ–‡ï¼Œé€™æ˜¯ç›¸ç•¶ç›´è¦ºçš„å»ºç«‹ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡çš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥å¦‚æœæˆ‘å¸Œæœ›ç”¨å‰ä¸€å€‹å­—å’Œå¾Œä¸€å€‹å­—ä¾†è¨“ç·´æˆ‘çš„Word2Vecï¼Œæˆ‘å°±æœƒæœ‰å…©çµ„æ•¸æ“šï¼š\((w(t),w(t-1))\)å’Œ\((w(t),w(t+1))\)ï¼Œç›¸ç•¶å¥½ç†è§£ã€‚

è€ŒCBOW(Continuous Bag of Words)ä½¿ç”¨å¦å¤–ä¸€ç¨®æ–¹æ³•ä¾†å»ºç«‹ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡é—œä¿‚ï¼Œå®ƒå°‡ä¸€æ’å­—æŒ–æ‰ä¸­é–“ä¸€å€‹å­—ï¼Œç„¶å¾Œå¸Œæœ›ç”±ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡çš„é—œä¿‚æœ‰è¾¦æ³•çŒœå‡ºä¸­é–“é‚£å€‹å­—ï¼Œå°±åƒæ˜¯å¡«ç©ºé¡Œï¼Œæ­¤æ™‚è¼¸å…¥å±¤å°±è®Šæˆæœƒæœ‰å¤šæ–¼1å€‹å­—ï¼Œé‚£è©²æ€éº¼è™•ç†ï¼Œç­”æ¡ˆæ˜¯è½‰æ›åˆ°Embeddingç©ºé–“å¾Œå†ç›¸åŠ å¹³å‡ï¼Œå› ç‚ºæ˜¯ç·šæ€§è½‰æ›ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ç›´æ¥ç·šæ€§ç´¯åŠ å°±å¯ä»¥äº†ã€‚

import collections

from urllib.request import urlretrieve

%matplotlib inline

VOCABULARY_SIZE = 100000

def maybe_download(url, filename, expected_bytes):
    """Download a file if not present, and make sure it's the right size."""
    if not os.path.exists(filename):
        filename, _ = urlretrieve(url, filename)
    statinfo = os.stat(filename)
    if statinfo.st_size == expected_bytes:
        print('Found and verified %s' % filename)
    else:
        print(statinfo.st_size)
        raise Exception(
          'Failed to verify ' + filename + '. Can you get to it with a browser?')
    return filename


def read_data(filename):
    """Extract the first file enclosed in a zip file as a list of words"""
    with zipfile.ZipFile(filename) as f:
        data = tf.compat.as_str(f.read(f.namelist()[0])).split()
    return data


def build_dataset(words, vocabulary_size=VOCABULARY_SIZE):
    count = [['UNK', -1]]
    count.extend(collections.Counter(words).most_common(vocabulary_size - 1))
    dictionary = dict()
    for word, _ in count:
        dictionary[word] = len(dictionary)
    data = list()
    unk_count = 0
    for word in words:
        if word in dictionary:
            index = dictionary[word]
        else:
            index = 0  # dictionary['UNK']
            unk_count = unk_count + 1
        data.append(index)
    count[0][1] = unk_count
    reverse_dictionary = dict(zip(dictionary.values(), dictionary.keys()))
    return data, count, dictionary, reverse_dictionary


print('Downloading text8.zip')
filename = maybe_download('http://mattmahoney.net/dc/text8.zip', './text8.zip', 31344016)

print('=====')
words = read_data(filename)
print('Data size %d' % len(words))
print('First 10 words: {}'.format(words[:10]))

print('=====')
data, count, dictionary, reverse_dictionary = build_dataset(words,
                                                                vocabulary_size=VOCABULARY_SIZE)
del words  # Hint to reduce memory.

print('Most common words (+UNK)', count[:5])
print('Sample data', data[:10])

æœ‰äº†èªæ–™åº«ï¼Œæˆ‘å€‘å°±å¯ä»¥ç”¢ç”Ÿå‡ºæˆ‘æƒ³è¦çš„è¼¸å…¥å’Œè¼¸å‡ºï¼Œåœ¨Skip-Gramæ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå¦‚æœæˆ‘çš„è¼¸å…¥æ˜¯target wordï¼Œæˆ‘æœƒå…ˆå¾target wordå‘å‰ã€å‘å¾Œçœ‹å‡ºå»skip_windowçš„å¤§å°ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥å¯ä»¥é¸æ“‡ç•¶ä½œè¼¸å‡ºçš„å­—æœ‰skip_window*2å€‹ï¼Œæ¥ä¸‹ä¾†æˆ‘å¾é€™skip_window*2å€‹ä¸­é¸æ“‡num_skipså€‹ç•¶ä½œè¼¸å‡ºï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ä¸€å€‹target wordæœƒç”¢ç”Ÿnum_skipsç­†æ•¸æ“šï¼Œå¦‚æœæˆ‘ä¸€å€‹batchéœ€è¦batch_sizeç­†æ•¸æ“šï¼Œæˆ‘å°±å¿…é ˆæœ‰batch_size//num_skipså€‹target wordï¼Œä¾ç…§é€™æ¨£çš„è¦å‰‡ä¸‹é¢å»ºç«‹ä¸€å€‹Generatorä¾†æƒææ–‡æœ¬ï¼Œä¸¦è¼¸å‡ºè¦è¨“ç·´ä½¿ç”¨çš„Batch Dataã€‚

def skip_gram_batch_generator(data, batch_size, num_skips, skip_window):
    assert batch_size % num_skips == 0
    assert num_skips <= 2 * skip_window

    batch = np.ndarray(shape=(batch_size), dtype=np.int32)
    labels = np.ndarray(shape=(batch_size, 1), dtype=np.int32)

    span = 2 * skip_window + 1  # [ skip_window target skip_window ]
    buffer = collections.deque(maxlen=span)

    # initialization
    data_index = 0
    for _ in range(span):
        buffer.append(data[data_index])
        data_index = (data_index + 1) % len(data)

    # generate
    k = 0
    while True:
        target = skip_window  # target label at the center of the buffer
        targets_to_avoid = [target]
        for _ in range(num_skips):
            while target in targets_to_avoid:
                target = random.randint(0, span - 1)
            targets_to_avoid.append(target)
            batch[k] = buffer[skip_window]
            labels[k, 0] = buffer[target]
            k += 1

        # Recycle
        if data_index == len(data):
            data_index = 0

        # scan data
        buffer.append(data[data_index])
        data_index = (data_index + 1) % len(data)

        # Enough num to output
        if k == batch_size:
            k = 0
            yield (batch.copy(), labels.copy())


# demonstrate generator
print('data:', [reverse_dictionary[di] for di in data[:10]])

for num_skips, skip_window in [(2, 1), (4, 2)]:
    batch_generator = skip_gram_batch_generator(data=data, batch_size=8, num_skips=num_skips, skip_window=skip_window)
    batch, labels = next(batch_generator)
    print('\nwith num_skips = %d and skip_window = %d:' % (num_skips, skip_window))
    print('    batch:', [reverse_dictionary[bi] for bi in batch])
    print('    labels:', [reverse_dictionary[li] for li in labels.reshape(8)])

class SkipGram:

    def __init__(self, n_vocabulary, n_embedding, reverse_dictionary, learning_rate=1.0):
        self.n_vocabulary = n_vocabulary
        self.n_embedding = n_embedding
        self.reverse_dictionary = reverse_dictionary

        self.weights = None
        self.biases = None

        self.graph = tf.Graph()  # initialize new grap
        self.build(learning_rate)  # building graph
        self.sess = tf.Session(graph=self.graph)  # create session by the graph

    def build(self, learning_rate):
        with self.graph.as_default():
            ### Input
            self.train_dataset = tf.placeholder(tf.int32, shape=[None])
            self.train_labels = tf.placeholder(tf.int32, shape=[None, 1])

            ### Optimalization
            # build neurel network structure and get their loss
            self.loss = self.structure(
                dataset=self.train_dataset,
                labels=self.train_labels,
            )

            # normalize embeddings
            self.norm = tf.sqrt(
                          tf.reduce_sum(
                            tf.square(self.weights['embeddings']), 1, keep_dims=True))
            self.normalized_embeddings = self.weights['embeddings'] / self.norm

            # define training operation
            self.optimizer = tf.train.AdagradOptimizer(learning_rate=learning_rate)
            self.train_op = self.optimizer.minimize(self.loss)

            ### Prediction
            self.new_dataset = tf.placeholder(tf.int32, shape=[None])
            self.new_labels = tf.placeholder(tf.int32, shape=[None, 1])
            self.new_loss = self.structure(
                dataset=self.new_dataset,
                labels=self.new_labels,
            )

            # similarity
            self.new_embed = tf.nn.embedding_lookup(
                               self.normalized_embeddings, self.new_dataset)
            self.new_similarity = tf.matmul(self.new_embed,
                                            tf.transpose(self.normalized_embeddings))

            ### Initialization
            self.init_op = tf.global_variables_initializer()

    def structure(self, dataset, labels):
        ### Variable
        if (not self.weights) and (not self.biases):
            self.weights = {
                'embeddings': tf.Variable(
                                tf.random_uniform([self.n_vocabulary, self.n_embedding],
                                                  -1.0, 1.0)),
                'softmax': tf.Variable(
                             tf.truncated_normal([self.n_vocabulary, self.n_embedding],
                                                 stddev=1.0/math.sqrt(self.n_embedding)))
            }
            self.biases = {
                'softmax': tf.Variable(tf.zeros([self.n_vocabulary]))
            }

        ### Structure
        # Look up embeddings for inputs.
        embed = tf.nn.embedding_lookup(self.weights['embeddings'], dataset)

        # Compute the softmax loss, using a sample of the negative labels each time.
        num_softmax_sampled = 64

        loss = tf.reduce_mean(
                 tf.nn.sampled_softmax_loss(weights=self.weights['softmax'],
                                            biases=self.biases['softmax'],
                                            inputs=embed,
                                            labels=labels,
                                            num_sampled=num_softmax_sampled,
                                            num_classes=self.n_vocabulary))

        return loss

    def initialize(self):
        self.weights = None
        self.biases = None
        self.sess.run(self.init_op)

    def online_fit(self, X, Y):
        feed_dict = {self.train_dataset: X,
                     self.train_labels: Y}
        _, loss = self.sess.run([self.train_op, self.loss], feed_dict=feed_dict)

        return loss

    def nearest_words(self, X, top_nearest):
        similarity = self.sess.run(self.new_similarity,
                                   feed_dict={self.new_dataset: X})
        X_size = X.shape[0]

        valid_words = []
        nearests = []
        for i in range(X_size):
            valid_word = self.find_word(X[i])
            valid_words.append(valid_word)

            # select highest similarity word
            nearest = (-similarity[i, :]).argsort()[1:top_nearest+1]
            nearests.append(list(map(lambda x: self.find_word(x), nearest)))

        return (valid_words, np.array(nearests))

    def evaluate(self, X, Y):
        return self.sess.run(self.new_loss, feed_dict={self.new_dataset: X,
                                                       self.new_labels: Y})

    def embedding_matrix(self):
        return self.sess.run(self.normalized_embeddings)

    def find_word(self, index):
        return self.reverse_dictionary[index]

# build skip-gram batch generator
batch_generator = skip_gram_batch_generator(
    data=data,
    batch_size=128,
    num_skips=2,
    skip_window=1
)

# build skip-gram model
model_SkipGram = SkipGram(
    n_vocabulary=VOCABULARY_SIZE,
    n_embedding=100,
    reverse_dictionary=reverse_dictionary,
    learning_rate=1.0
)

# initial model
model_SkipGram.initialize()

# online training
epochs = 50
num_batchs_in_epoch = 5000

for epoch in range(epochs):
    start_time = time.time()
    avg_loss = 0
    for _ in range(num_batchs_in_epoch):
        batch, labels = next(batch_generator)
        loss = model_SkipGram.online_fit(X=batch, Y=labels)
        avg_loss += loss
    avg_loss = avg_loss / num_batchs_in_epoch
    print('Epoch %d/%d: %ds loss = %9.4f' % ( epoch+1, epochs, time.time()-start_time, avg_loss ))

from matplotlib import pylab
from sklearn.manifold import TSNE

def plot(embeddings, labels):
    assert embeddings.shape[0] >= len(labels), 'More labels than embeddings'
    pylab.figure(figsize=(15,15))  # in inches
    for i, label in enumerate(labels):
        x, y = embeddings[i, :]
        pylab.scatter(x, y, color='blue')
        pylab.annotate(label, xy=(x, y), xytext=(5, 2), textcoords='offset points',
                   ha='right', va='bottom')
    pylab.show()

visualization_words = 800
# transform embeddings to 2D by t-SNE
embed = model_SkipGram.embedding_matrix()[1:visualization_words+1, :]
tsne = TSNE(perplexity=30, n_components=2, init='pca', n_iter=5000, method='exact')
two_d_embed = tsne.fit_transform(embed)
# list labels
words = [model_SkipGram.reverse_dictionary[i] for i in range(1, visualization_words+1)]
# plot
plot(two_d_embed, words)

æ¥è‘—çœ‹CBOWçš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå¦‚æœæˆ‘é æœŸè¼¸å‡ºçš„å­—æ˜¯target wordï¼Œå¾target wordå‘å‰å‘å¾Œçœ‹å‡ºå»context_windowçš„å¤§å°ï¼Œçœ‹åˆ°çš„å­—éƒ½ç•¶ä½œæˆ‘çš„è¼¸å…¥ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥æˆ‘è¼¸å…¥çš„å­—ç¸½å…±éœ€è¦context_window*2å€‹ï¼Œä¸€å€‹target wordåªæœƒç”¢ç”Ÿä¸€ç­†æ•¸æ“šï¼Œå¦‚æœæˆ‘ä¸€å€‹batchéœ€è¦batch_sizeç­†æ•¸æ“šï¼Œæˆ‘å°±å¿…é ˆæœ‰batch_sizeå€‹target wordï¼Œä¾ç…§é€™æ¨£çš„è¦å‰‡ä¸‹é¢å»ºç«‹ä¸€å€‹Generatorä¾†æƒææ–‡æœ¬ï¼Œä¸¦è¼¸å‡ºè¦è¨“ç·´ä½¿ç”¨çš„Batch Dataã€‚

def cbow_batch_generator(data, batch_size, context_window):
    span = 2 * context_window + 1  # [ context_window target context_window ]
    num_bow = span - 1

    batch = np.ndarray(shape=(batch_size, num_bow), dtype=np.int32)
    labels = np.ndarray(shape=(batch_size, 1), dtype=np.int32)

    buffer = collections.deque(maxlen=span)

    # initialization
    data_index = 0
    for _ in range(span):
        buffer.append(data[data_index])
        data_index = (data_index + 1) % len(data)

    # generate
    k = 0
    target = context_window
    while True:
        bow = list(buffer)
        del bow[target]
        for i, w in enumerate(bow):
            batch[k, i] = w
        labels[k, 0] = buffer[target]
        k += 1

        # Recycle
        if data_index == len(data):
            data_index = 0

        # scan data
        buffer.append(data[data_index])
        data_index = (data_index + 1) % len(data)

        # Enough num to output
        if k == batch_size:
            k = 0
            yield (batch, labels)


# demonstrate generator
print('data:', [reverse_dictionary[di] for di in data[:10]])

for context_window in [1, 2]:
    batch_generator = cbow_batch_generator(
        data=data,
        batch_size=8,
        context_window=context_window
    )
    batch, labels = next(batch_generator)

    print('\nwith context_window = %d:' % (context_window))
    print('batch:')
    show_batch = []
    for i in range(batch.shape[0]):
        tmp = []
        for j in range(batch.shape[1]):
            tmp.append(reverse_dictionary[batch[i, j]])
        show_batch.append(tmp)
    print(show_batch)
    print('labels:', [reverse_dictionary[li] for li in labels.reshape(8)])
